comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. üòä  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

Game is fun. But giving me pop ups to bring me back to the game while it's not open is a nono. Especially when it takes up half the screen. I'd give 5 stars cause i had fun playong this, but this one thing is annoying. Especially with the amount of ads, it shows you just wanna push people to keep playing for that ad revenue. Won't be downloading any of your games after i delete this now.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

★ CONTACT ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com
developerAddress: Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong
recentChanges: - Bugs fixed to improve overall gaming experience
summary: Play ENTERTAINING & ADDICTIVE word search game on BOARDS!
title: Word Cross

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
I don,t have the words to say about the game but only one problem of this game ads always on. The top of the screen

Great game 5/5 levels get more challenging as you go I'm not that far into the game but I hope there will be decorating the trucks at one point and/or those buildings make money as your going threw the levels but still a great puzzling game üòÑ

This game has alot of benefits, especially, the decision making, plan ahead, multi tasking, pattern recognition and many more. Thank to this game, its very addictive, plain and simple, make you relax and it doesnt stress. Deserve to be 5 star.

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
recentChanges: - A new challenge: Mirror mode! Another perspective to solve the puzzles  [Complete 100 levels to unlock mirror mode]
- Expert Mode par values are now tougher on some levels!  [Complete 200 levels to unlock Expert Mode]
- Improved tutorials to help new players
summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

comments: I love this, the achievements and different types of characters are great, the only the that sucked for me was the music. I wish there was at least more variety because the song that plays throughout the menu and game isn't that good + it gets old.

One big problem... You can't see where you're going. The character is right in the middle of the screen and you can't see what's coming at you... Aside from that, the game is fun and challenging. A better game like this is Smash Hit. Try that instead.

description: Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way. The road is full of pitfalls, but it‚Äôs sure to pull you in.Features:‚Ä¢         Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that‚Äôs popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush. ‚Ä¢         Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.‚Ä¢         Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!_____________________________________________Visit us at www.what.gamesFollow us on: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WHATgamesOfficial/YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdYDfC-K4vtEQGkh7hY--0w LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company-beta/18157777/ This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.End-User License Agreement: www.what.games/eula Privacy Policy:  www.what.games/ppTerms of Use: www.what.games/tos
descriptionHTML:
Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way.

The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Features:
• Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush.
• Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
• Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.

The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!

comments: Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. About the game? Well, I'll tell when this problem is gone üòÖ

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!

Although FoE is very enjoyable, it can get very complicated, especially for new players. The biggest drawback is the lack of instructions...new players, unless taken under the wing of an experienced player, have to fumble through at first, many times guessing or using trial and error to accomplish the simplest things.

At first I was a little unhappy with the amount of stuff I can do with spending diamonds, but I now find it refreshing, not to spend active hours on a game in order to receive a reward. I'm glad they reward patience.

Started playing, made some progress, then the next time I went to play it wouldn't link back to my Google account and kept saying incorrect password. You get one star because that was frustrating and I couldn't get back to the game I already made progress on. UNINSTALLED...
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
recentChanges: It‚Äôs Carnival time! Collect Florins and get cool rewards!
You can enjoy the Carnival Event between February 22nd and March 12th.
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!
summary: Build and advance your city from a stone age village to a future metropolis.
title: Forge of Empires

comments: I'm really enjoying this game. It beats the previous bid wars-storage auctions & pawn shop game I've played. Could you please add the opinion to change the cash to English pounds (¬£) and the chance to open more lockers and better chances on getting rare items. And tell us which cities we could find certain items we need to have in storage to complete missions.

My game is literally unplayable right now. For about a week now, it has randomly just lagged out and would take 5 seconds for every action to actually take place. Now, when i boot up the game, it just freezes when i click on anything. My shop tries to open but just goes to a black screen and freezes. I will try to play for a few more days, but if i cant play by the end of the weekend, i will be deleting the game.

Have a problem, mutt's semi legal store thing won't work. The black screen to show the result thing shows up top left corner, but it's just stuck there. And the rest of the screen shows the normal background for mutt's semi legal store, and I pretty much can't do anything when this happens. I have to reset the game, and each time I try to "show results" in mutt's semi legal store, same thing happens. Please fix this

What is wrong with the newest update? I can't acquire my item from the switch shop. Every time I click on get item, the black screen goes to the top left of the screen. And I can see the normal background picture. When that happens I have to close the game and reset. I've tried to get the item 20 times and it does that every time.

Was a great game til the update. Now I have to open it twice for my energy to update and for the money in the pawn shop to change. Also when I bargain with clients now it's alway a negative profit compared to before. More annoying then anything

It's a fun game my only complaints are that you have to wait until your energy refills. There is no way to earn energy and you should make it so you can customize and/or upgrade your shop. Make it more exciting. Also you open the building that say they will finish construction soon because the game gets boring if there no excitement added to it.
description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You‚Äôll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTSüí∏PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!üí∏OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: An honestly good game with neat intentions, but I do have a complaint that is probably common for other. It's that the game just freezes abruptly and you can't do anything unless you restart it. Hopefully this gets resolved quickly, but other than that it's a good game

Best drag racing game I've played in a while, doesn't force you to spend money but the option is there.  Not in a rush for class E to be released since class D isn't finished yet, in expert races I only see a pink wire frame of the interior and no rev indicator, negatively impacting gameplay since most quests call for these races.  Otherwise great game.

Like the game so far. How do you change the camera view to inside the cockpit. There doesn't seem to be an option anywhere to change camera as advertised. Maybe I'm missing something. Other then that it's very fun game. Thank you

You guys still havent fixed the problem with the boosters for samsung. There is still a x-2 on two of the purple boosters which causes it to not appear when i go to choose it in the race.please fix the problem
It's a fun game but it won't let me buy tires even though I got more than enough money, i have 60000 dollars and cant even purchase a 7000 dollar pair of tires

Really enjoy the game it was easy to get a hang of the controls but there was a minute there i couldnt win however theres always a way to get it done. I like the cars I guess i do sorta wish you could use the expert view at all times but i do like to look at the cars. The loot drops are also better than many similar games. All in all very entertaining
description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.DRIVING PHYSICSIt's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!
descriptionHTML:
Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!

STYLING
Styling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.

DRIVER'S SKILLS
Upgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.

TUNING
You are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.

DRIVING PHYSICS
It's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!

Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.
Constant ads.  Excruciatingly slow progression unless you pay.  Game crashes more than I crash in the game.  Could have been a great sequel to HCR 1, but it feels like playing a money-grab instead.

Superb game! Too bad, the elements of hate like to hack good things and cause frustrations. For this reason, constantly run constant updates. I wouldn't mind paying through my rather expensive data to diffuse the damage by these bored, small prick nincompoops! Africaüòùüòùüòù

On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

Great game, been playing for five months now and have managed to get all but 5 hero's unlocked. Lots of chances to save up radios for hero calls and love the different types of game especially the guild.  Haven't spent a penny on it and don't think you need to if you have a little patience and use your resources wisely.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

Great time waster. Wish the gas would increase quicker. Hero's are pretty easy to get after a while. Freemium aspects of the game not shoved down your throat they are there but not essential (So far) LVL 25

Quite addictive however you need to learn how to play this game. It's difficult at first. SINCE LAST UPDATE GAME RESTARTS AFTER EVERY MOVE! WILL FIX MY RATING WHEN THIS ISSUE IS FIXED. IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO PLAY
description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you‚Äôll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl‚Äôs crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham‚Äôs assault rifle. ‚Ä¢ FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat‚Ä¢ COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead‚Ä¢ CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission‚Ä¢ HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead ‚Ä¢ JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards‚ÄúThrow in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.‚Äù - Pocketgamer‚ÄúEach aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.‚Äù - Mashable‚ÄúImagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead. That‚Äôs No Man‚Äôs Land in a nutshell.‚Äù - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

For player support, please visit:

descriptionHTML:
Race, train and breed your way into becoming the number one horse racing manager! Rise through the ranks by winning derbies and cups to obtain the Ultimate Championship.

Compete in contests against other jockeys online everyday with new and exciting events constantly galloping in.

FEATURES

RACE:
• Ride your way to the top by competing in the local derby or circuit to win earnings and make your way toward the Ultimate Championship.
• Races can be viewed in the intense and suspenseful manner just like a real-life derby or through quick results to get back to business.
• Stunning 3D graphics and realistic photo finishes make Horse Racing Manager 2018 the best virtual horse racing simulation experience around!
• Move through a realistic and immersive calendar of races.


TRAIN:
• Set regiments to prepare your horse for major upcoming matches.
• Boost horse performance stats with food, rest and physical training.
• Maintain and upgrade stats through a variety of training methods or breed horses to create the strongest and fiercest of bloodlines.
• Exercise routines can vary in surface conditions, exertion levels and more.
• Only the best of the best racing horse owners know how to keep their horses in peak form, well rested and at an optimal weight.
• Need your horse to pack on a few pounds? Try treating it to a handful of sugar cubes!
• Unlock additional stable slots to bolster an even more impressive roster of horse racing stars.

CUSTOMIZE:
• Choose a unique look for your jockey and horse with an assortment options.
• Adjust the outfits, emblem and colors that suit your own personal taste.
• Bond with every horse in your stable by giving them individual names.
• Customize a nurturing environment for your horses to flourish!

BREED:
• Buy, sell and breed horses to participate competitions and create a powerhouse stable full of speedy candidates.
• Match two horses with favorable traits to inherit special attributes and stats.
• Rare breeds can be unlocked with special genetic traits such as zebra stripes or super speed.
• Be sure to breed carefully because unique skills can only be obtained through breeding and not trained.
• Participate in a slew of events that can affect special Breeding Rights.
• Stunning 3D visuals showcase an impressive variety of unique colors, patterns, and traits acquired through breeding.

Stop just watching the horse races and take part in the action. Saddle up cowboys, because the number one horse racing management sim is here! Can you be a world-class horse racing manager talked about from Kentucky to Epsom!? Become a horse racing legend now!

* PLEASE NOTE! Horse Racing Manager 2018 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
Meet other players and find out more about Horse Racing Manager:
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/horseracingmanager2018
* Twitter: @HRM_2018 (http://twitter.com/HRM_2018)
* Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimePRIVACY
* Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimeTOS

title: Horse Racing Manager 2018

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to party with Talking Tom and Friends in a completely NEW KIND OF PUZZLE GAME! Sling and match colors to clear the pool and win! It’s FREE and EASY to play, whether you’re young or just young at heart, so jump into the fun! There’s no other game like it.

***HOW TO PLAY***

Here’s how you can rule the pool!

SLING, BOUNCE, AND MATCH
* Enjoy the game’s unique “sling” mechanic – just pull back the floaties, release, and let them bounce! Match the floaties in the pools to complete the levels and earn keys.

USE GREAT POWER-UPS
* The ROCKET removes all floaties of one color;
* The UNICORN will make all your floaties multicolored for a turn; and

USE THE KEYS to UNLOCK, BUILD and CUSTOMIZE THE WATER PARK
* Use the keys you earn to open new levels and unlock more imaginatively-shaped pools with fun backgrounds.
* Complete the 360 EXCITING LEVELS and beat all the challenging obstacles.
* Explore worlds filled with pirates, dragons, and more!

Join Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger in this exciting water park adventure. It’s the ultimate pool party and everyone's invited! Get ready to party with Talking Tom like never before as you bounce, splash, play, and build the greatest water park ever!

Jump in and download Talking Tom Pool now – it’s free to play!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- The possibility to connect with friends via social networks;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate 2018 Lunar New Year with Google Play
Enjoy double diamonds offer and exciting in-game holiday events available on 14 - 22 Feb 2018.

“Seal:New World” – The Rascal Rabbits are back! Classic 3D MMORPG returns!

Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!


● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!
The classic returns!
Finally play Seal Online in multiplayer mode on your mobile – a whole new story with a brand new experience!


● 3 Classes Are Back: Knights, Priests and Jesters!
An improved world-view with more exciting levels to challenge.
Upgrade your character, choose skills, gear and train pets.
Alliance system, World Boss gameplays, Arena, Survival challenges, Magic Beanstalk, and more for you to explore!

● Hide the Cleavers! Rascal Rabbit is Back!
Train pets and take them with you – over 40 kinds, all cute yet deadly!
Ride your mount into battle; no need to tire your little legs anymore...

● Hundreds of Costumes; Dress to Impress
Wondering what to wear today? Change costumes according to your mood.
Loads of fashion and accessories to choose from. If you can imagine it, we’ve got it!

● Say Goodbye to Singledom – Let’s Get Married!
Tired of being single? Try out the in-game wedding system.
Earn intimacy points and propose to the object of your desire.
Hold a wedding banquet, choose your wedding dress and invite your friends to witness your special occasion!

● Fun Social Interaction
Chat with players in-game using text or voice messages.
The fairest trading system around; perfect for making new friends!
developerAddress: 5118 HOPEWELL CENTRE 183 QUEEN'S ROAD EAST WANCHAI HONG KONG
summary: Rascal Rabbit is back! Classic 3D MMORPG, review the memories of 14 years ago!
title: Seal:New World

descriptionHTML:
The massive strategy war game "Z Max", is a masterpiece! Survive during the apocalypse! Zombies attack! Get lv 10 townhouse when you start playing now! Defence helicopters, and top-tier heroes gifted when you sign in!

Setting
The story takes place in 2049, leakage of nuclear power plants results in a large number of human beings being subject to nuclear radiation, turning them into walking dead - humanity has never withstood such an unprecedented challenge!
At the same time, humans are competing for limited water resources and fighting each other, the Earth has become a bloody killing field!
This world has no order at all, whoever has weapons in hand controls the resources, you can dominate this world! Do you want to take up this challenge?

Features
A Traditional SLG game mode with even more strategic campaigns and development aspects. Not only can you develop territory for the development of armaments, you can also make helicopters and late-stage chariots. In addition to traditional siege fighting, the game has also added competitive exercises, Fury Road, fortress battles and oasis battles as well as other war games. You will get to know players from all over the world and participate in social games such as Alliance Gathering and Cultivation Base.

Gameplay and Functions
**Real-time Translation System**
Break the barriers of language communication, and support real-time translation of all languages in chatting.

**Fly a helicopter**
Experience the piloting of helicopters, the pleasure of annihilating a zombie town.

**Global Competition**
Zombie towns, the four major resource fortresses, global players scramble for the "Doomsday Fortress."

**World Rank**
Castle level caps will gradually open, creating a more fair game environment.

**Alliance Interaction**
Expand your alliance territory and kill the Alliance Boss.
Collect resources with partners for additional higher yields

**War Supplies**
Raise your castle level to gain soldiers directly.
When losses in battle are too great, trigger war reinforcements and receive large amounts of assistance for free.

**Casual PVP**
Play with global players anytime, anywhere for honor ranking.
Arena fighting will not cause any loss of troops.

**Recruit Heroes**
With the growth of legendary heroes, greatly enhance the combat capabilities of the troops.

Contact Us
https://www.facebook.com/ZMaxGame

comments: Ive been playing for the better part of a year, and this game started out great for a long while. But IGG not only panders and gives better deals to Chinese people, cheaper packs etc. But literally 99% of all mega guilds and players are Chinese or Vietnamese. If your not asain don't play this game  you'll end up like me playing forever just to quit because of the obvious discrimination IGG holds with its playerbase

Not a good game for new players.  Was fun and  interesting at first but you qucikly realise that you are just food for high level players with no way to reach a defensible level.  High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

Kingdom 249 is open before just 50 days back. And one guild have 2B might. Most of the guys have millions of might one of them got 700M might. How's this is possible. Kingdom 277 is opened before 15 days back but one guild K03 got more powerful. Top guys got 120M might in just 15 days. Does IGG employees playing this game. We are lover of this game please don't lose your credibility. This two kingdom which I observed only Chinese players are strong. How overall kingdom only Chinese players got higher might in less time.

Do NOT go for high level military research without searching monster hunting, and Do NOT go for T4 if you not going to spent thousands of dollars. Even if you don't mind to wait 200 days, you will not able to afford it (lvl 10 military Def, Atk, Health cost 100m gold each). DO NOT GO FOR HIGH MILITARY AND T4 WITHOUT FULLY UNDERSTANDING THE GAME.

This game is fun but be prepared for the mother of all Pay2win games.  These folks at IGG are experts at crafting new and exciting ways at fleecing their customers of every cent they can.  You CANNOT compete if u dont pay and pay often.  Players here ...just regular people... dump hundreds of rl $$$ regularly.  You have been warned.

Troops die just because you are not sheltered or shield...Strengthen all troops and walls even defenses and masters... Also lessen the price of buying shields it cost a lot of gems and longer is effectivity like if it is 1day update it to 1day and 12 hrs and cost it 1.6kgems is good mostly for us busy people

comments: Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actually online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Nice game ...the only problem  I say would be its pay to win philosophy. Yeah it's easy in the beginning but the gear gets really scarce to if your really trying to win it'll be next to impossible to do so with out swiping that good 'ol debit card. Otherwise it's a fun and awesome game. That is in the beginning....

Good concept. Good game. Many glitches. For a game that's touted for and based on pvp it makes no sense that %80 of the time the game freezes going into a pvp battle. It's okay though, you can close it and then immediately reopen it to a message that tells you that you died. Fix your freezing problems and I'd give you 4 stars.

Really solid graphics and game play for mobile. Doesn't want to work with my Bluetooth controller. As a free game they have really doubled down on the shards and multiple currencies to try to get you to spend. You really need to grind if you want to unlock anything without paying.

comments: I absolutely love this game. I spend a lot of time on it! It's fairly balanced between players who play for free and those who purchase gems to give their bots better stats. You can easily rank up without paying a dime. I did for so long, until I kept hoarding pieces and didn't want to sell. I began to use gems instead of coins.

This game is have potential, don't ruined it because of money. I have never been watching so many ads In my life just to get some 2 stars parts. Instead of being creative and making cool machines, this game is turning to - either pay to win or watch alot of ads to win. What's the point of "playing" in this game?

I think this app is great! But there is a slight problem with selling items. When I repeatedly sell items, sometimes if, for example, I was selling an item for 6831 coins, then it would subtract 6831 from the total amount of coins I have and then add back in 6831 so I'd end up with just the same amount of coins I was at! Could you please fix this small bug? It would make this app even better!

Developers, please read.  First, this is a fun game and I enjoy its play style. It's reminiscent of TV shows like Battles Bots and game series' like Bot Arena.   Second, I would like to suggest giving players the ability to add, delete, and move weapon, utility, and wheel anchors. In the same way players can currently add enhancements to parts and chassis's and move around stickers.   Third, It would be appreciated if Quick Play Super Boxes replaced Regular Boxes after all shipment slots are full. It would provide a greater incentive to keep playing Quick Play beyond just Winning Streak Crown Rewards.  I'm offering these suggestions because I really enjoy this game and would like to see it become a more fulfilling and personalized experience.  Thank you,

Fun strategy game, just wish it was easier to understand upgrades and easier to get a decent vehicle. Sometimes you have to wait for boxes other times you can watch ads to get thru them with no rhyme or reason as far as I can tell. The variety or maybe the lack of variety in boxes is pretty annoying. Sometimes you get the exact same part multiple times or with slight variations, which can drag out trying to get a decent upgrade on things.

Its now just a money grab... not happy with the way this game is going, it used to be a fair rewards system, with decent quality gear, then it changed to become basic gear almost all of the time, then it became difficult to prestige since it was have good rockets and a lifter or don't win and now you actually get very little for your hard work climbing the ranks. Waiting 24 - 48 hours for a reward doesn't cut it for me.

descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!

comments: This is the best life simulator game by far. Instead of just focusing on getting rich this game has many other focuses like love, nationality, jobs, kids etc. The one thing that isn't at all necessary but I kind of want to see is a avatar for the character you're playing as. Perfect game. üòÅüëç  EDIT: hi just reporting on a glitch in the game. There's an option to transition your gender bit even though my character is over 18 they can't do it. Otherwise still a perfect game.

I think it's incredible and I am hooked. Although I do hope for more such as, instead of just instagram famous, perhaps become a famed scientist, actor, writer, astronaut or business person OR be known as beloved (or not so) Educator/Teacher etc. A bit more drama added with partner/children good and not so good. Varying reactions to their dilemmas, perhaps even a child dating, married, having a child (grandkids) and other random child updates with or without the option to react accordingly. Overall, addictive and thoughtful game.

Hi - playing this game for a few months now and a big fan. I suggested during beta phase that there should be an option of money management as well. We can be a millionaire but dont know what to do with all that liquid. We should be able to invest in moveable and immoveble assets. Should be able to open a company/business and invest in other company's stocks etc. This game will be even more interesting that way. Hope we will see these features soon. Thanks.

I have been playing through the beta phase, and am completely hooked. You can pick it up and play whenever the mood strikes. It is easy to grasp, every new life is different, and it is engrossing without being addictive. Once you're done with a life you can create a new one or close the app and move on with your real one. There is no waiting for something to build or happen, there are very few ads and most are by choice to gain something. There are no in-app purchases to enhance game play, its all there from the beginning. The developers have done an incredible job with a simple concept.

Truly amazing game. Highly recommended to anyone who likes simulator games. Works without wifi and the developers listen to what u have to say. Sure, there are a few glitches but I'm sure they'll get fixed over time. Loved it Edit: can you transition your gender without having gender dysphoria

First of all, congratulations on the full release! I've been playing this game for a few months now and I'm absolutely hooked. Whenever I'm bored or don't want to use my phone's data, I just play this game. There are a few things that I think would be cool to add in or go more in depth with, but other than that, this game is borderline perfect! I reccomend downloading
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

title: InstLife

comments: I'm really fond of this game and love the gameplay and quick paced matches. The new update is AMAZING!   There are a few things that would make this game extra perfect for me!   Must have character customisation. This would be of big amazing to me. Char customisation makes me bind more to certain characters. The rings we get don't have much value to them except for upgrading the characters.  Could have non-ranked matches. I would love the option to play/practice against rivals or my own friends.   Should have quick chat responses. Would like to communicate before and after the match with simple reactions. Like Good luck and I win, tee-hee!

This is one of the best mobile games I have played I a while. I probobly have a bias sense I love Sonic so much. However, if one thing could be added I would say it should be a converter for the Red Star rings to normal rings. Unless you want them to be payed for. I don't really care either way I'll just buy the Red Star rings but I brought up that idea because I currently have 23,000 rings just kinda waiting to be spent. Maybe incorporate phone backgrounds or some customizations for the game that cost extra rings? Thankyou so much for the new update and if anyone I'd debating on installing it just get it. You'll have fun, trust me.

Please add a custom character, there is one in the main game so there should be one here to. Also please add infinite, cubot, orbot, and eggman. Also some more variety of music and areas would be good. Thank you for reading and for the great game! :)  (Edit): we need a friending system and to be able to customize our characters so that we have SOMETHING to spend rings on. And Espio needs some serious buffing because right now, he is pathetic.

Until the previous update, everything ran fine. But now, with the Cream update, the game lags a TON. I get frozen on one frame while everything's still happening. I start off in first, then the framerate drops to 0 temporarily while I'm bombarded with obstacles I can't see to do a thing about. Fix these performance issues and I'll put my rating back to 5 stars.

To many ads unless you make some kind of purchase. Loading screens seem to take longer than I'd like. You can't at this time play with friends as Opponents are automatically chosen. There is still some characters ability noise in the game even if you have music and sound off. I'd like to see characters abilities not to be so similar, but it isn't taking away from the game at the moment for me. With all that said though the graphics are great, the game is fun, and it's worth the $1.99 purchase I made.

This game is if Sonic Dash mixed with Racing. And I LOVE IT!!! One suggestion I have that I don't think many online multiplayer games have, add some sort of singleplayer mode. Otherwise, great game! I like that it's free with ads being removable via in game purchases (which I did), controls, graphics, and soundtrack are outstanding, overall, I love the game, and I look forward to more updates in the future.

descriptionHTML:
** Over 5 Million Downloads! **

Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!

FACTS
The Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.

Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.

FEATURES
* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game
* Create your own player and join your favorite team!
* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator
* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!
* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!
* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.
* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!
* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!
* No Fouls
* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.

** Barangay Ginebra
** Alaska Aces
** Magnolia Hotshots
** San Miguel Beermen
** Tropang TNT
** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters
** Meralco Bolts
** NLEX Road Warriors
** Phoenix Fuel Masters
** Global Port Batang Pier
** KIA Picanto
** Blackwater Elite

Guest Teams:

* Gilas Pilipinas
* 2017 All Star Luzon
* 2017 All Star Visayas
* 2017 All Star Mindanao

PERMISSIONS
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player
* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player
* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos
* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statistics

We will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.

Like our facebook page to get updates and join contest
fb.com/pbaslamgame

And visit our websites at:
www.philippineslam.com
www.ranidagames.com

For comments and suggestions you can email us at
info[at]ranidagames.com

summary: The best free basketball game for your mobile devices!
title: Philippine Slam! 2018 - Basketball Slam!

comments: I like this game a lot BUT the lack of gems takes the fun out of it.  I've tried a few times to get free gems by installing game's or completing a quiz but I only sometimes get the gems after. And the casino boat thing is a joke. You barely win anythingüòï I noticed nearly everyone is complaining about the same thing so I've been waiting for this to be sorted. Nothing has changed so I'll be deleting the app shortly..... What a pity!

If you love using your hard earned money for virtual play this is the game for you. What starts out with gems being a few at low amts as you advance the gem amt grows ridiculously outrageous. Move on because this game will break your bank account quickly.

It's a pretty entertaining game. BUT you have to buy EVERYTHING with gems (aka real money). Programmers focus excessively on making players pay even before they are hooked to the game!!! After getting to the second street zone, I find myself unable to continue unless I pay. I find it a little lame after all the effort you put on creating a pretty good game. Bye

Cute to see yall deleted my last review. Re writing and giving you 1 star.  Game crashes constantly. . Can no longer get into.  No more money will be spent till fixed. And if my review is removed again. I will just uninstall

Fun game at first... but be prepared to spend money if you want to get 3 stars in events! Also after you conplete the first area, they force you to spend real money to get to the next areas! Its is ridiculously gem hungry! Ive played a lot of games and tgis one takes the cake as the most gold/gem hungry game ive have ever played. The crusie ship is a scam too! Will be deleting it!

You can't proceed without gems once you unlock the second area. Pretty sad, because the game has potential. Hate to see greed override balance. You should be able to grind in a game like this and proceed... Not get stuck because you choose not to spend excessive amounts of cash.

Cook tons of fabulous cuisines and become a top chef in this addictive time-management food truck cooking game! Download now for free!

Travel across the world and spread the Food Truck craze, something a restaurant could never let you do! Use various ingredients to cook lots of amazing recipes of delicious dishes and desserts like Coffee, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, Burger, French Fries etc…

This fun food truck cooking game has more than 150 new ‘n’ tasty dishes and more than 250 levels to play with, and a dash of challenge at every turn. More cuisines being added all the time!

Upgrade your kitchen appliances to cook quick and fast. Decorate your truck with awesome upgrades to keep the surroundings cool and fun for everyone.

Game Features:
• Unlock lots of cool levels with unique dishes and ingredients.
• Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen and be a better chef.

• Chase whacky achievements.
• Battle it out against other chefs at the Food Truck Carnival
• Play with your friends when you connect to Facebook

Let’s fire up the grill!

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

I have a problem with my account. My punk zombird was maxed out. Level 3. Then when I opened the game, my punk zombird was gone... I obtained that by waiting patiently and gathering 90 diamonds. I had to watch 3 15-30 sec long video for 2 diamonds each. After watching the 3 vids, I had to wait another 8 hours for it to be available again. It took me a month to obtain that bird and then all of a sudden it dissapears?! I obtained it again but I had to start all over again. I uninstalled this app because of that issue.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy üíé gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyoneüíñ you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!

comments: People complain about the ads but 2 dollars is all you need to remove them. Cheap and it supports this fun game. If your game audio is interrupting the jumping then plug in some ear buds, it's that easy people!

It's a great game, hilarious concept, only thing I have issues with is that the noises for picking up the coins pick up as sound. Frustrating when you are trying to be careful and it dings and sends the chicken into a mine... Maybe make them doubtless so they don't get picked up by mic.

Good game but enough with the ads. Way too many and way too long. The ads are longer than the game play. Ine ad was over 30 seconds long. You guys obviously do not read these comments or reply to any of them. This could be a great game.

Love the concept, but it doesn't work at ALL. I downloaded it, and no matter what I do, nor how absolutely silent it is, the chicken is running and jumping and I have zero control over it. Super disappointed--hopefully it's just glitching?? I wanted to try it, but neither sound nor silence give me any control over it üò£

Way too many adds. The adds block the sensitivity, so I cant adjust that, so I have to scream as hard I can for a jump. Then a 30 sec minimum add almost every retry. No thanks. Could be entertaining though
It was a neat concept but it didn't work at all. Whenever I talked it took a couple seconds to actually register and playing a game like this with that amount of lag is impossible
description: Chicken scream is a fun and interactive non tapping addictive game where your voice controls the chicken. Make a lot of noise to force the chicken to run and jump or stay quiet to control the chicken moves slowly. Get your high score and collect points for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles and the water!**** How to play and control the chicken ? ****- Don't make any noise to make the chicken stop- Speak softly to make the chicken walk- Scream to make the chicken jump
descriptionHTML:
Chicken scream is a fun and interactive non tapping addictive game where your voice controls the chicken.

Make a lot of noise to force the chicken to run and jump or stay quiet to control the chicken moves slowly.

Get your high score and collect points for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles and the water!

**** How to play and control the chicken ? ****

- Don't make any noise to make the chicken stop
- Speak softly to make the chicken walk
- Scream to make the chicken jump

comments: Hey miniclip.. good morning.. i am from india.. i was playing 8 ball pool dubai match. I was just about to win when i hit my solid ball and then last black ball was left but the ball goes in opponents hand said that you didn't hit your ball.. what was that? Can you please stop all these hacks and all for other users. There is no fair gameplay between each other.. please do some favourable to all users.  Hope you will take quick action in this manner Thanks.. Apoorv

First of all It's joyful game few notes need to address it:    1_last 3 weeks is suddenly stopped without farther notification.. And I was about to uninstall it..     2_one of the question was you can play with other users offline. This is not correct!...     3_ need to add "Edit and changing names"     4_Game rated with 5 star.. Than you all üé±

I realize y'all gotta get paid but why make the playing experience for those of us that don't pay cash money.  Not allowing a player to select a pocket when shooting the 8 ball and allowing your opponent to shoot and win. I guess I'm pretty good because nobody has been able to get rid of me playing pool. Instead I seem to get strange lock ups or no response from game. I always seem to lose 100s of thousands. It's a pretty good app and I've sent many people to download your app.

Best pool graphic wise but the game is not fair what so ever. Game is Controlled you don't decide if you win the game does. Your win percentage and rank don't mean squat. Cues length and force controlled to games advantage even when reloaded. I had 6,991,000 and my win percentage was 61.3 and lost 1 million 5x in a row. How do I have a 61.3% chance of winning and lose so easily by these 40-50% players like nothing. If you don't actually buy stuff with actual money on app game will treat you poorly.

8 ball i have been playing it for sometime now and I spend alot of money on the specials.. great specials.. but I noticed whenever I buy coins I don't win any games until those coins are over and I'm only winning recently 2 games maximum in a row and normally my win streak used to be 7 and above... I don't know why this is happening but it sucks because it's putting me off the game.. it's like 8 ball is making sure I'm losing hence the rate 3

This is the most addictive game i have playing since a bought this phone. All the new updates are cool. Need to get rid of those hackers playin along. Also when we get a phonecall the game reopens, its better if you  reconnect it during the tier its self .. very plesent game give lots of happiness.. make sure you work with above mentioned glitches, then 5* is sure.
