description: Raft: The Last Maverick ‚Äì an original story-driven free survival game brought to you by Pride Games Studio, the well-proven survival genre masters. A new action adventure from the creators of Survival Island: Evolved will take you on a ride to the deep ocean waters set in a beautiful steampunk open world. You find yourself as a lone survivor on a raft amidst the endless waters of the Pacific, having to survive bloodthirsty sharks and underwater predators along with hunger, thirst and exhaustion. Explore tropical islands and hidden dungeons, gather resources, craft weapons and armor, upgrade your raft and evolve your hero ‚Äì fight for your survival! Raft: The Last Maverick brings the survival simulator games to the new level of realism, engagement and fun.Craft! Evolve! Survive! * Survival of the fittest! Do your best to survive ‚Äì design and upgrade a unique raft and turn it into real shelter. Explore the ocean for useful materials, craft new armor and weapons to fight off primal predators, hunt for food and learn to produce fresh water. Dive into action ‚Äì everything you do will increase the chances of your survival.* Pimp your Raft! Start with just a small patch of wood that barely keeps your survivor afloat and build, build, build! First set up beds and chairs, then create furnace, workbench, water purifier and tons more of useful constructions. Evolve your building skills well enough and your hero will craft almost anything, even a real ballista to protect your shelter! An impenetrable steampunk fortress or a glamorous hotel with an ocean view ‚Äì Craft your Raft until it makes you Daft! * The Lord of the Skills! As your hero ventures further into the ocean, you‚Äôll witness him grow, develop and become stronger with each action taken and new level achieved. Let your survivor evolve from a green sailor-boy to the real Pacific Terror! * Blazing Guns of Captain Hook! The endless ocean not only offers stunning views but also holds many dangers. To keep enemies at bay Raft: The Last Maverick gives you a vast arsenal of guns, melee weapons and other means to defend your floating shelter. If you run out of anything, the trusty hook will always come in handy to reach far off crafting and building materials without the need to roleplay as a shark bait! * Raft Fiction! Follow the enticing story of The Last Maverick. Complete quests, look for other survivors, face brutal betrayals and bizarre plot-twists, form strong bonds with unlikely allies and craft your own destiny. Put all your strength to achieve the final goal ‚Äì reaching the New World. If you play your cards right and manage to survive long enough you‚Äôll be the one to uncover the mystery behind the unfortunate shipwreck. What at first seemed as just a coincidence might turn out into the meanest deception the steampunk world has seen! * Three men in a Raft! Multiplayer mode coming soon! Once you feel confident in your skills and evolve past the beginners point, you‚Äôll be ready to join forces with your friends online to add even more brutal action to your adventure. Team up with other players online in the multiplayer mode, decide if you wish to save them from starvation or rob them of their last means for survival. Multiplayer will bring a new thrill even to the most weathered Heroes of the ocean!Join us: https://www.facebook.com/thelastmaverickgame
descriptionHTML:
Raft: The Last Maverick – an original story-driven free survival game brought to you by Pride Games Studio, the well-proven survival genre masters. A new action adventure from the creators of Survival Island: Evolved will take you on a ride to the deep ocean waters set in a beautiful steampunk open world. You find yourself as a lone survivor on a raft amidst the endless waters of the Pacific, having to survive bloodthirsty sharks and underwater predators along with hunger, thirst and exhaustion. Explore tropical islands and hidden dungeons, gather resources, craft weapons and armor, upgrade your raft and evolve your hero – fight for your survival! Raft: The Last Maverick brings the survival simulator games to the new level of realism, engagement and fun.
Craft! Evolve! Survive!

* Survival of the fittest! Do your best to survive – design and upgrade a unique raft and turn it into real shelter. Explore the ocean for useful materials, craft new armor and weapons to fight off primal predators, hunt for food and learn to produce fresh water. Dive into action – everything you do will increase the chances of your survival.

* Pimp your Raft! Start with just a small patch of wood that barely keeps your survivor afloat and build, build, build! First set up beds and chairs, then create furnace, workbench, water purifier and tons more of useful constructions. Evolve your building skills well enough and your hero will craft almost anything, even a real ballista to protect your shelter! An impenetrable steampunk fortress or a glamorous hotel with an ocean view – Craft your Raft until it makes you Daft!

* The Lord of the Skills! As your hero ventures further into the ocean, you’ll witness him grow, develop and become stronger with each action taken and new level achieved. Let your survivor evolve from a green sailor-boy to the real Pacific Terror!

* Blazing Guns of Captain Hook! The endless ocean not only offers stunning views but also holds many dangers. To keep enemies at bay Raft: The Last Maverick gives you a vast arsenal of guns, melee weapons and other means to defend your floating shelter. If you run out of anything, the trusty hook will always come in handy to reach far off crafting and building materials without the need to roleplay as a shark bait!

* Raft Fiction! Follow the enticing story of The Last Maverick. Complete quests, look for other survivors, face brutal betrayals and bizarre plot-twists, form strong bonds with unlikely allies and craft your own destiny. Put all your strength to achieve the final goal – reaching the New World. If you play your cards right and manage to survive long enough you’ll be the one to uncover the mystery behind the unfortunate shipwreck. What at first seemed as just a coincidence might turn out into the meanest deception the steampunk world has seen!

* Three men in a Raft! Multiplayer mode coming soon! Once you feel confident in your skills and evolve past the beginners point, you’ll be ready to join forces with your friends online to add even more brutal action to your adventure. Team up with other players online in the multiplayer mode, decide if you wish to save them from starvation or rob them of their last means for survival. Multiplayer will bring a new thrill even to the most weathered Heroes of the ocean!

Join us:
https://www.facebook.com/thelastmaverickgame

Just carefully follow the step by step voice tutorial in the game and make tasty snack, burger and donut cookies and Show your skills as the kitchen master and raise the cooking level with “Princess Sofia - Cooking Games for Girls”. The interesting thing is, you’re not making these snacks only for yourself but you are going to deliver them to the customers coming to your fairy magical restaurant.
Key Features:
• Cool and colorful graphics used
• Optimized for all Android devices including tabs
• Free to download and install
• you’ll be playing a real chef running your restaurant
• A good chance for kids to develop basic cooking skills
• Amazing sounds and music

“Princess Sofia - Cooking Games for Girls” is really a fun app for the little kids. It’s just a perfect game to have on your device if you have small children who are keen on fairy magical cooking games.
Please don’t forget to give us your feedback in the review section of this food fever game. We will use your valuable feedback to improve the game and make it more fun for your kids. Thanks
summary: Start making food with princess sofia: Cooking Games

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.

comments: Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

This game has definitely improved since I'd last played it but, there is still some room for improvement. Controls are one thing. This has always been a problem. More controls need to be added, like the steering wheel. Also, real tracks and events. I'm not sure can you actually do this but if you can, please add this and also, graphics. If you could put in some better shaders and if you could improve upon the car models. This game is okay. I rate this 6/10.

descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

comments: I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. It's pricey but we'll worth the purchase. I kinda wish the pace of customers was a little bit slower so I had more time to prepare the food. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

Love this game. Easy to play. My daughter and her partner both downloaded after playing mine.  When I first downloaded the game I didn't need to have the internet on. Don't know what happened but I know have to be on the internet to start the game but can then turn the internet off. Otherwise happy with it. So many restaurants to buy. And you can get ahead with the casino and keep playing everyday to get more money and gems. Thumbs up from me.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.

I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location ‚Äì to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage ‚Äì to correctly save your progress

With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: It's a fantastic game, nothing less than what I'd expected. The graphics were fantastic, the story engaging, the characters well developed. However, it was too difficult to earn the in game currency. Perhaps you could add in a video where the players are able to earn gems? Even if it's only once it twice a day, I'm sure it'll definitely help. All in all though, this was a great game as usual. Keep up the good work!

I've been obsessed with Sherlock Holmes since I was about 7. Every incarnation of him, be it the books, the TV show or even the anime has left me completely in awe of Sherlock.  So I'm sad to say that I feel this falls short. As it's own game, it's great. I love the story and the characters are well developed. However, I went into it with a certain idea of how Sherlock should act, and it's not what I got. I understand why though, and it's not too distracting from the game. With that being said, I thoroughly enjoyed myself. The puzzles were a fun mechanic (a little easy for my liking, but still enjoyable) and the art style is really pleasing. Overall, I do think it's a game worth downloading.

I really love it. Just like the other "shall we date" games you guys made. However, twice already did i not get my free SH points after doing the required action for it. Is there anything for that? Also if you guys are into the idea, you can do a free small amount of gems for watching an advertisement once every day or something? All the rest in the games you guys make is awesome and i love em all.

The best Shall We Date game by far.  The characters are funny,  especially Sherlock and I love the plots.  If you can make Sebastian,  Jack, Hercule,  Jeremy and even Lestrade's routes it would be SUPER appreciated.  Omg, I think Lestrade's route would be the funniest because ALL of them would rip and mock him.  üòÇ  Update: I still think it's the best one.

Great game, I think it's the best game shall we date had. Female lead is independent woman who doesn't make me wonder why everyone likes her. Guys are great as well, plus I absolutely the writing. It's probably the only game were I was bothered to play more than 3 routes

This game is so good.  The premium scenes are totally worth it, the normal scenes are also so good and hilarious. The characters have such personality that it's hard not to see them as their own people.  Met so many good friends through the fandom for this game.  No matter the future of GMS I'll be a life long fan.

descriptionHTML:
Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 11:00 PM (PDT) and get useful items! Don’t miss the starter SALE to get special avatar items for FREE.

◆From the creators of Otome games for FREE with <32 million DLs> comes the newest competitor, Guard Me, Sherlock!◆

◆WHAT’S AN OTOME GAME?
You’re the heroine - Otome - in these simulation games, experiencing the sweetest moments with hot men. Just tap your way through more easily than reading a visual novel. These large-scale love story games are different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable on your devices!

◆ABOUT GUARD ME, SHERLOCK!
“I didn’t realize this until you showed up, but when I sleep alone, my bed is EMPTY and COLD.”
You visit the office of the world’s greatest detective, Sherlock Holmes, wanting to request him something unique. There, you meet charming men with quite a colorful personality, together with whom you’ll get involved in various incidents.
Do you want Sherlock to be your bodyguard and live together with him and Watson in his office at 221B Baker Street? Or do you want to go on a trip with the mysterious millionaire Professor Moriarty and catch a thief? Can you escape the “elementary” crime? Experience thrills after thrills in modern London with classic characters transformed into irresistible hotties!
The British geniuses will eventually fall in love with you and whisper words of love, kissing you. Choose the path of your romance story with them, and the ending you’ll reach will be a moving one!
Solve the mystery of the case and love all in one story!

◆YOUR HANSOME GUARDS:
Sherlock Holmes - “Do YOU have feelings for John?”
Undoubtedly, the world’s greatest detective with exceptional logic. He used to only be interested in strange cases until he met you, and he’ll notice he has feelings towards you unlike any he’s ever felt before. But his best friend John H Watson has the same feelings toward you too! Where will that love triangle lead you?

John H Watson - “I promise that I’ll always strive to be someone who’s good enough for you, someone who deserves you. So...will you marry me?”
The best friend of Sherlock and another genius. He’s smart, gentle, and perfect - what’s the reason behind him proposing to you on the very day you meet? And what will you do when Sherlock tells you that you’re the only one that he could open his traumatized heart to?

James Moriarty - “By the time this journey is over, your life will have changed COMPLETELY.”
The Napoleon of the backstreets of London, and the biggest rival of Sherlock Holmes. Coming from a noble family and the way of the law, he plans a stage aboard the gorgeous Reichenbach Express for you. He’s never the one to hide his affection for you...but at the same time holds a horrifying secret.

◆FEATURES:
*FREE to play!
*Read with Story Tickets, which will recover themselves in time
*Beautiful artwork, alluring soundtracks and motion effects
*Solve mysteries unique to each character’s story
*Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
*Cute avatars in Japanese anime style with constant updates
*In-game events frequently held with exclusive prizes
*Available ON FACEBOOK too!

◆HIGHLY RECOMMENDED IF YOU:
-love romance novels or movies
-love Japanese games, manga, novels or anime
-are interested in dating sim games but prefer something more simple
-want to enjoy being in love with a variety of men
-want to have a love affair without anyone knowing
-love to read mystery novels
-are crazy about Sherlock Holmes
-love to investigate and judge someone guilty
-love romance games / dating games for free
-love fashion and dressing up your avatar
-enjoy reading fiction with grand setting

◆FOLLOW US:
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company that strives to make the best Otome games / romance games / dating games for adults and fantasy games for free.

comments: The game is awesome. But ya'lls parking lot sucks badly. I've in criest the parking lot 4 or 5 Times now,  and it won't still let me put more than one item at a time. It really ticks me off. I have one for sale and 10 more to sale. Now I can't buy any thank else. The inside is bad to. Not worth trying to make larger. Each time you increase the front, you get just a nough room for a small shelf.

I used to play this game a few years back.. but now loads has changed you cant make a collection to sell anymore. Also i cant store anything in the store room.. plus i have a vehicle that doesnt sell in the car lot. And you cant do tasks anymore were a customer calls to give you a challenge

I wish there was more content to the game, it's the same items over and over again. After a while it just gets boring and turns into a decorating game. It has none of the nuances of the show it is based on. However with a little bit of effort it could be turned around into something really entertaining.

Slow . the game loads slow. When i tap on the people to buy their items it takes a minute to pop up . graphics can be alot better as well. The game needs more work. I would be happy to play it if these issues were fixed because I am a fan of the pawn stars show.

I would love this game so much more since I can't afford to pay real money for games! This happens when someone with Epilepsy is on disability and only receives a few dollars each month to pay for meds and doctor's appointments! I do admire Corey though since he does do stuff for the Epilepsy Foundation! ‚ùó

I used to love this game, recently tried downloading it again n it wont go past connecting to server, ive uninstalled 6 times and still no luck ive even left it for hour to connect but no luck.. Shame

comments: Great game, I don't buy the gems so it's a little challenging but with daily rewards I was able to get a mega digimon after about 2 weeks. Only issues I have are the lack of some digimon such as those from Digimon Frontier, would love to see them. Also, I would love to know how to get points for the wild shop, thank you and keep up the great work!!

One of the most, if not the most, enjoyable Digimon games I've played. It's challenging enough to make you want to continue on. It's also very fun to raise your digimon through their digivolutions. One issue I have run into is the lack of health potions which is a pain when you're in the midst of battle. Something else I hoped for is that more of the Digimon Frontier spirits be added to the game. I loved that season and most Digimon games skip right over them. I hope you guys don't, anyways the game is seriously bad ass.

This is a good game. So much digimons and powers But i think you should let gamers to choose there own digimon in the begining and not to limit options in only three digimon I am a digimon fan and i was so excited to play with antylamon and cherubimon. But you don't put that digimon in the game. Thats a big loss for your huge list of digimons. Thanks fo the game

Honestly this gamr is super good. Its like playing a phone version of the pokemon series, just with digimon. The problem is the servers. It seems like every time they add a "new server" all the old ones slow down. This leads to upwards of 2 minutes sitting with a buffering sign. Makes it pretty much unolayable. Damn shame i really enjoyed this one. Invested both time and money on this one

dont know why Bandai doesnt make a game like this... This game is better than digimonlinks in my opinion... the downside of this game is just to evolve a digimon to mega.. it takes a lot of time to capture wild digimon.. can you make it a little easier?? Because it needs 35 champion for just 1 mega... TT.. maybe 10 champion is just enough... :D  but overall it's a good game...

I have been playing this game for a month and progressed well without purchasing gems.. Suddenly one day it my game freezed while loading and I already bound my account before that. The game didn't starting by any means.. So I cleared game data and when is starts I logged in with my account.. And it takes me to select character screen. All my progressed has been lost and I can't be able to access my account.. I even mailed ocean studios but they didn't replied. I'm afraid if my account didn't recovered then I'm going to gonna give bad review. Take care of your players who are playing it for a time.

descriptionHTML:
Monster Frontier is a 3D game with Digital Creature theme. Battle to collect monsters is the essence of this game.

★HD Digital World Graphic
This game has excellent graphics. Extensive maps and unexplored new islands. A wide variety of beautiful islands with hundreds of creature living in it served with great detail

★The Beast from Jungle
Unlike traditional card collection methods, almost all powerful digital creature exist and live in the wild in the world of digital. They can be scanned directly and captured inside your device.

★Creature Evolve
Capture and collect to evolve your monsters and make them stronger. You can evolve 5 times to the most powerful level. Each evolve your monster will change the body.

★Social gameplay
Monster Frontier has a fully social features in the game. You can have friends, Guilds, and there are many different social systems that provide a great social experience.

comments: Game has potential but why is there so many fu**ing ads??? They aren't even short they are all 30 plus seconds long and after Everytime you shoot 1 shot. Not worth the download guys! 5 seconds of action 5min of ads I really don't even see how it has a 4.2 rating must be 5 stars from bots

This is a great app the missions could pay a little better so you can upgrade your ammo or sights out side of that thank you for the great game
The control is not good at all making it not easy to do a headshot

comments: Marshmallow bug! Great game. Fun to play. However, since I upgraded to Marshmallow, each time I open the app, all my settings reset. I have to go back in and turn sound off and vibration off. This didn't happen in lollipop. Also, easy mode seems a bit too hard at times. Not a complete issue, but it makes this game harder to play. Thanks for the creative game and I'll keep playing it to destress.

This is the only game app that I've kept installed. Simple and fun yet still challenging. When I'm at waiting at a restaurant or doctor's office, or just bored in general, I can pull this out and play with whoever I'm with. Always leads to us laughing.  Helps if you have a rubber or textured case on your device and clean your screen before you play.

My first F*kin-Cool game playing since 2011! This app has stayed since the first android I had back in 2011 the Samsung galaxy ace, many phones changed but this app seems to have been with me forever. Using this since Android Eclair!!

Amusing, but not in long run Boring as the time goes by. It also should have feature to change colour of the  hockey glow. Provide more feature and game mode will make this game more interesting. I would very appreciate it, if you add the online option and world ranking. So we could play against each other and see our rank. And adding an annual tournament-like will be great. The high score (or such) feature also needed here.

I have always loved the game but.. Now a days it kinda gets stuck may be its my phone or any problm by ur side i dont know. But do look at that if there is any prob like that the bat moves very 'slowly' n m not able to play instant shots.

This sort of game is great! For long car trips... there's no reason to play it unless you are bored out of your mind, and even then it gets boring fast. Maybe add some unlockables or levels. Other than that it's not not bad.

comments: This game is the only one of it's kind that I've ever really gotten into. But I fell in love with it and have gotten some real cool friends out of it. They really have thought everything thru and keep improving the game play consistently. Other than not explaining a few parts of the game enough I really don't have any complaints.  You really don't have to spend money, as long as you are an active player an devote enough time to it. And from what I have heard about other games it's not quite as crazy of a $$$ spong as some other games my brother plays. Over all I think this if a great game and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for that new game to occupy your boredom & spare time. I give it a 9 outta 10.
Fun game and unlike others u don't come back next day and find out u have to start over cause ur dead good job
Wait to play or pay to play? How about not play at all? Instant uninstall for games that have time blocks you can pay to remove. What a garbage practice.
I have been playing for only an hour. So far so good. I do like a good challenge and this game has peaked my interest
If you pay to play you win, to many over powered players constantly attacking smaller players. I will be uninstalling soon
Pretty cool it gives u just enough resources actually I think give you a pretty decent amount could be a little more though but still love the graphics design and it's pretty easy to play
description: -Over 3,000,000 Downloads!- Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!-Description-Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game! Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!-Features-Lilliputian Toy War:‚Ä¢ Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!‚Ä¢ Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!Grow Your Army:‚Ä¢ Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!‚Ä¢ Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!‚Ä¢ Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!Expand and Exterminate:‚Ä¢ Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.‚Ä¢ Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.Strategize to Win:‚Ä¢ It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. Diplomacy or War, it‚Äôs up to you!‚Ä¢ Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.-We Are Waiting For You!-Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

descriptionHTML:
Transport passengers from a city to another city terminal through amazing places and landscapes.

Customize your bus with varieties of liveries, horns, telolets, bumpers, velgs, and many more!

- Bus STROBE Lights

- Bus customization with varieties of liveries, horns, telolets, bumpers, and velgs to choose from.

We always try to bring you the best game ever, so we need you feedback. Don't forget to rate our Mobile Bus Simulator and leave a review. Because it means a lot

ENJOY & Thank You!

So let‚Äôs play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.Game is simple and easy to play. descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
summary: Rock Paper Scissor is the best addictive app to settle your dispute in a fun way
title: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle

comments: Keeps your attention for its entire duration. Also there are no pointless long intervals between messages like in some other games of the genre. Nicole's dialogue is very... real, totally like what a real girl would say. Including paradoxes like "plz don't change eh en though I probably will", that's female logic at its finest. Although how would I know ehat a real girl speaks like? :-P Mark's dialogue choices, on the other hand, sometimes seem unrealistic, sometimes silly and childish, sometimes plain stupid. Totally NOT like what a real guy would act like. Kinda aggravating, you could've had more options in this regard. The interface looks like a real messaging app, and actually I'd rather use Seen for messaging than my built-in messaging app.  Authors, consider that as an option. Kudos for the interface. :-) Overall, a very good one.
OMG I love this game all though one part sucked at the end it made me cry, this game! I hate the ending! Please change it. Even though....I hate change.üòâ (For the Nicole part)

Thank you. Your application has helped me in more ways than you will ever know. Thank you.

description: What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again? Seen is an interactive story set in high school where you play as Mark Blythe, a student who fell in love with the new fellow student, Nicole Tyler. Do you have what it takes to catch her heart?Get to know Nicole, Mike, Jake, Jenny, and Valerie. Explore various outcomes based on your decisions in a world where change is inevitable. This game features a remake of "annie96 is typing..." by Pascal Chatterjee, a creepy chat history that took Reddit and Twitter by storm.FEATURES‚Ä¢ Different outcomes based on your choices‚Ä¢ Make your own stories with Story Maker‚Ä¢ Play other players' stories and share your own with Story World‚Ä¢ Includes "annie96 is typing...", the creepiest chat history you‚Äôll ever play‚Ä¢ Realistic chat client inspired by Facebook MessengerSeen is not just an interactive story game, it's a platform for interactive story games! Make your very own chat stories with Story Maker. The possibilities are endless. The only limit is your imagination.Once you're done making a story, let the world play it with Story World and play others' stories as well. Story World is an in-game community where players can upload and download stories (currently in Beta).FOLLOW US‚Ä¢ PolychromaGames.com‚Ä¢ facebook.com/PolychromaGames‚Ä¢ twitter.com/PolychromaGamesDONATE‚Ä¢ bit.ly/2btduCyWe always make sure that our games are of high quality so if you encounter a problem, please don't hesitate to contact us :)
descriptionHTML:
What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again? Seen is an interactive story set in high school where you play as Mark Blythe, a student who fell in love with the new fellow student, Nicole Tyler. Do you have what it takes to catch her heart?

Get to know Nicole, Mike, Jake, Jenny, and Valerie. Explore various outcomes based on your decisions in a world where change is inevitable. This game features a remake of "annie96 is typing..." by Pascal Chatterjee, a creepy chat history that took Reddit and Twitter by storm.

FEATURES
• Different outcomes based on your choices
• Make your own stories with Story Maker
• Play other players' stories and share your own with Story World
• Includes "annie96 is typing...", the creepiest chat history you’ll ever play
• Realistic chat client inspired by Facebook Messenger

Seen is not just an interactive story game, it's a platform for interactive story games! Make your very own chat stories with Story Maker. The possibilities are endless. The only limit is your imagination.

Once you're done making a story, let the world play it with Story World and play others' stories as well. Story World is an in-game community where players can upload and download stories (currently in Beta).

FOLLOW US
• PolychromaGames.com
• facebook.com/PolychromaGames
• twitter.com/PolychromaGames

DONATE
• bit.ly/2btduCy

We always make sure that our games are of high quality so if you encounter a problem, please don't hesitate to contact us :)
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Make links clickable in chat messages (Linkify for Story Maker)
‚Ä¢ View and update downloaded stories (Library for Story World)

‚Ä¢ Filter Story World stories by keyword
summary: What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again?

descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
recentChanges: „Éª Added a Skip button to opening tutorial.
Remix 10, made of some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play, is here!
There are also some brand-new courses, a new playable character, and a new feature that lets you listen to your favorite music while you play!
Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?
summary: Remix 10 is here!
title: Super Mario Run

descriptionHTML:
[Awards]
Golden Plume Award for best picture quality
2017 Mobile Online Game Award for Best Writing
4 Asian Game Award Nominations includes “10 Creative MMORPG”
The Most Expected Mobile Game of Global Kingdom War Players in IGN Research
——The most romantic 3D Kingdom War mobile game in 2017, Sword of Romance

「Background」
Lv Dongxuan, the No.1 master of swordcraft, reincarnated and fell in love with the daughter of the infante but they were finally pulled apart. When they met again, the poor girl was about to die of sickness.
To save her life, Lv took up his sword and killed countless immortals. He finally swore to the god that he would give up his life, instead, the girl will become immortal.
---"I keep seeking my love, but finally I find you and will keep holding your hand..."

[Features]
---Find lover for years---
Wander on earth for thousands of year for the girl in red! The most beautiful marriage in mobile games of 2017, romantic encounter, gorgeous wedding, for you!

---God of Kingdom War---
Will not regret to die for the nation in the Kingdom War! With Command System in game, you can direct the kingdom war yourself. Win the war definitely!

---Anchor plays with you---
Lovely dimples smile, fine eyes blink, exceeding charm awaits your admiring! Anchors from China mainland, Taiwan, Singapore and Malaysia gather in the game to play with you!

---Eminent 3D world---
Holographic of 720 degree brings you an eminent world with Dynamic particle rendering. 6 nations, 12 sceneries are in the map. Wherever you go, fantasy world is there.

---Set the trend with Fashionwears---
Fairy style, Girl-next-door style, Uniform temptation, or swimming suit, there is always a suitable for you.

---Equal drops, fair trade---
With the equal drop rate, non-top-up player can be powerful! Players can trade fairly without any intervention of system

Facebook：@SwordofRomance
summary: Seek my love, Hold your hand!
title: Sword of Romance

description: Everyone in this world love his or her school days, always remembering your school days give a smile on your face even in your bad time. Welcome to the virtual school of the vice city in this Gangster Girl in High School simulator, this will remember your teen school days. Where you have to play as a gangster Girl to do all these things with your teachers, principle, bullyboys and with the classmates that you miss out in your school days.Enjoy the most incredible Gangster Girl in High School simulator with incredible missions to play with. Choose your bully school girl to play with, tease everyone in school in the absence of the principal and show that how funny as well as your bully days was. 3D school environment, beautiful classrooms, and tons of students busy in their classwork give you the realistic feeling of your school days. Smooth controls and incredible missions in Gangster Girl in High School simulator made this game addictive. You have to choose your beautiful bully gangster girl to play such amazing missions in virtual school of vice city. Where you have to steal your mark sheet from the principal office and try to escape from the principal of the virtual school.Stand against other bully gangster boys, also steal football from them and do not get caught by him. Pick up the duster from the other classroom while teacher is busy in his lecture, do not caught by the teacher otherwise you have to face punishment from the teacher. Tease the other classmates by your funny movement. Fight with the gangster boys of the school that are disturbing your friend. Many more missions are also waiting in Gangster Girl in High School simulation. 3D graphics and fun gameplay made this game to the best school games. comments: This game is by far one of the BEST games I've ever downloaded. There are so many different games within and the story line so far is awesome. I love how interactive it is and the fact that you have so much to work up towards! Yes the ads may suck but it's free so I can't complain. Absolute A+ for whomever created this, highly recommend and I hope there will be more games like this!

Nice looking game, from what I can tell after 3 levels. Do I want to pay $15 to play more? I dont think it is that good. I do like the interactive intro/start up, and the game runs smooth. Graphics look nice. But still is it worth $15?  Dont think so, sorry guys. But I am sure other people might get enjoyment from this game so much they will pay to play. Good luck with it guys.

This is one of the BEST time management games I've ever played; I've never come across a time management game with such a beautiful story line. You will not regret playing this. Plus, this game doesn't force you to buy it; just sit through some ads. It's completely worth it. I can't stop raving about this game to my friends. Had me in tears a few levels into the story.

Wow... just by reading the comments other people write impressed me. I love games with acual storylines... I thing all games should have a storyline now. (And yeah, I do love the game, I just hadn't finished it when I commented so I gave it a three for then.)

I can't unlock the Victor achievement. I've had every spot completely occupied, including the waiting area, check out and even the heart replenishing station and still nothing! I'll probably uninstall if this issue isn't resolved. The bonus level where you have to clean up all the diapers froze multiple times forcing me to restart which was really frustrating too.

I loved it! So rare to find genuinely good mobile games but this was great! I didn't play the previous game (or games) but this one was amazing with the story, so well crafted. The gameplay was repetitive, but not boring. What happened to Victor!?!

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... 🏥 🚑 🔥

❤️ PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure
❤️ BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages
❤️ DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions
❤️ WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions
❤️ UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters
❤️ CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital
❤️ COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment
❤️ ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless level

Ready to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? 👩‍⚕️

This season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... 🏥

But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future...
Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out...

Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! 💉 🚑 🔥

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

comments: I don't see what's so great about this game. All you do is run around, kill people, and collect coins. I'm seeing all these reviews saying "great game bad controls," and I'm convinced that they're fake accounts created by the devs. The game sucks and holds no substance, but the controls are just fine. I've played the "updated" version, but it's the exact same thing; run around, kill things, and collect coins.

BEWARE My son downloaded this game on his tablet, and the first time he played this game, it completely crashed and wiped out his tablet, and we cannot get it to load past the first screen that shows the brand of the tablet.  It is no longer usable.  Very disappointing.  His tablet is less than two months old.
I love this game!! This is so fun! I'm already at level 3. I like how you can go to so many did fret places! The weird though is that I don't kill the women xddddd

Would have rated it a five I love the game but the problem here is it's hard to maneuver the screen when trying to get a view from behind, also sometimes when trying to get through some of the tunnels in the cave it sometimes would stop you from entering can you fix this? If not I'm ok but another problem is sometimes in the timed cave number ten you can't find any people to kill so you just die trying. I don't see a point of trying to kill 30 people when there's none to be found. I have died and not passed this level because of this problem.

Has potential What i would add to make this app award worthy: Add different types, sizes, or colors of werewolves, rag doll effects, dismemberment options in settings, an animation of the transformation at the beginning of each level, and it would be fun if there was a mode where you could infect people. Good game, but needs updates in gameplay if it's ever going to be worth paying money to download.

Intrusive ads and poor lighting The first and fourth levels are extremely annoying due to horrible lighting. I get that it's in a cave but it's very easy to get into awkward positions where you have to wildly flail the camera around to find out where you are... While ads keep randomly covering the screen. Not a bad game but the cave levels ruin it due to being purely frustrating.

comments: i am totally addicted to the game, I know that this game is still in the middle of improvement, the only thing I noticed is the battle area, I hope that the area would be more wider than what we have right now. Also the solo game, please put an option to play the game randomly teamed up instead of customizing the battle wherein we still need to invite other people. All in all, the game experiece was amazing. üíìüíû

Okay so I am editing my review.  They have the makings of what could be a great game. The only map I have access to so far is a beautiful battle map. Good amout of obstacles some nice cover and it look great.  My issues are with character movement. When you hit [dash] turning is almost none existing.  Your going in a straight line. One of the main reasons for dashing (for the hunter at least) is getting behind new cover. It would be nice if I could dash and weave my way through the obstacles.   Response time from scope up/scope down (hunter) needs work too as is it's way to slow. "Nice I shot the lead guy. But cr... theres two more coming and scope still up. DOWN, DOWN!  M O V E!!!"
Great game. But sometimes the enemy can't see me and just pass by me. I'm not sure if its my connection to your server or its a bug. I hope it can be fixed.
Aiming is a little choppy but better than some other shooters out there.. Movement speed overall should also go up. Overall still a really fun game. I recommend checking it out!
It feels like i m playing with bots..... And no real time chat with squad mates during fights.... That will make this game interesting...

Hi Funter! Great game you have here! But I know this can get better.  I've really enjoyed the first few days of playing this game. I'm also pretty content with the reward system, it's great to see you are generous with providing players considerable amount of money evertime we accomplish an objective. But I hope there's also a bonus when ranking up. I'm ranking up fast but I noticed I don't receive any kind of reward. But no worries, the objectives rewards got it covered.  Arena fights really got me hooked. The matchmaking was quick with less than a minute to prepare for a match. Fights were intense as more got eliminated. But I do have to complain about some parts. I hope you can allow players to do a slight curve while running or make that a skill to upgrade... It kind of limits the strategy to escape to safety when all you're heading to is a wall. same goes when I'm trying to turn my character 360¬∞ to face opponents behind me. I hope you can make turning a lot smoother next time. Aiming is hmmkay but it's not bad altogether. I'm glad it's made into a skill that can be upgraded but it felt much slippery when I upgraded it much. (I use the archer guy most of the time so...)  Lag was also present. I noticed one when one of my opponents suddenly turned towards me when he was facing his side some seconds ago.   Anyway, I'm really looking forward to this game. Game's got really good potential and I'm loving every minute I play this game.

descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Block Puzzle game - Simple but addictive puzzle game for any player. Once you have started, you will be fascinated by the interesting game. Try the block jewel puzzle game now, you will like it right away!

Block Puzzle is a classic puzzle game in which you arrange blocks of wood into a fixed square. The block wood puzzle game offer a great intellectual challenge for you. You will have to use your intelligence to arrange them in the most reasonable way.

How to start playing a block bricks game?
⇒ Select and drag the blocks in the bottom row. Move them to the optional position in the large square
⇒ Arrange to fill each row of the square
⇒ Each filled row will automatically disappear. You will have more space to arrange the next blocks
⇒ The block jewel games will end when the bricks block can't be grafted to the correct place in the square.

description: Let's go shopping at the mall with princess cash register! You can play as both the shopper and cashier. Use your pretty pink cash register to ring up any of the 52 princess items available. You can shop for makeup, shoes, bags, tiaras, and dresses. The cash register is a real working calculator with a scanner that can scan the available merchandise. You can also swipe the credit card to pay at the end of the shopping spree. Move money in and out of the cash register. Give your customer the right amount of change. There are also 6 different shopping phrases sound. Have fun and use your imagination with this princess cash register. You can now go to checkout with up to 3 items. descriptionHTML:
Beat you boss! Kick, shoot, smash, punch the boss and give him what he deserves! Punch the Boss is a perfect fit for stress relief.

Your boss is now in your hands. And so is an arsenal of weapons at your disposal! Kick the boss, shoot him with a machine gun, make him the target of a nuclear missile, slash him into pieces and have a whole lot more smashing fun today!

The most interesting part of the game is that you can customize the face of the boss. Put a face photo of your real boss to the buddy and whack him as you have dreamed for years.

Game Features:
- 3D realistic physics simulated
- Colorful and vivid graphics
- 80+ upgradable weapons
- Customize your boss with real photos

descriptionHTML:
Time for you and your friends to become the best little chefs around! No adults are around and you kids are hungry – you better prepare food, and fast! You guys are in charge – cook and bake whatever yummy food you want, and have a food fight!

Uh-oh – You’re starving, and no parents are home to feed you! It’s up to you and your friends to turn into gourmet chefs and make a delicious meal! Who said dinner before dessert?! You’re in charge now! Get creative in the kitchen and eat all the mouthwatering food you want!

Features:
> Is that your stomach growling? No one’s home to give you dinner, so you better get to the kitchen and start cooking!
> Turn into little kitchen wizards with your friends and prepare your favorite meals!
> Go to the supermarket with your friends and fill your carts to your heart’s desire!
> Choose yummy recipes to make, from 4 amazing cookbooks!
> Dress up as mini chefs, and clean up the messy kitchen! Don’t forget your chef’s hat!
> Use professional chef tools to make homemade pasta and pizza from scratch!
> FOOD FIGHT! Get messy in the kitchen.
> Bake cupcakes and make your own ice cream!
> You guys worked so hard making all that food – now it’s time to enjoy it in the dining room!
> Oh no! The oven exploded and one of your friends got hurt. Treat him with professional doctor tools so he can bake those treats!
> Have bake contests and vote for your favorite food. Who will win 1st prize?

descriptionHTML:
Love playing dress up games? Enjoy crafting & building your own worlds? Then Dress Up Craft is the game you’ve been waiting forever - it’s the only mobile game where best features of dress up games meet possibility of crafting & building anything!

Become fashion diva at home - dress up & makeup!
Don’t deny it - you’ve always wanted to be a famous fashionista. Now you can playing Dress Up Craft! It’s not one of these simple dress up games where you just show off on a runway without any clue. In Dress Up Craft every new day challenge you with different situation!

Let’s dress for success!
Enter the fashionista shopping salon to get the newest fashion! Visit spa and makeup salon, then nail salon. Don’t forget about your hair! Style yourself in many different ways! Fashion show? Day in high school? Games event? Wedding? Beach party? Wherever you go, you have to dress up accordingly!

Gain new levels to unlock new clothes!
On your way to become the greatest fashion designer ever you have to impress a lot of people. Friends from high school? The hottest supermodel they covet? Fashion designer? Famous rock star? Or maybe a real queen? Shine through like a doll house princess! Whenever someone express admiration, you gain a Glamour Points. This way you can level up and unlock new clothes from your fashionista’s wardrobe!

Crafting & building as it should be done!
Dress Up Craft doesn’t end here! You can still craft and build from blocks the whole fashion world. Use your imagination and be creative! Crafting & building mode lets you design and build your own runway, fashion house or even a wedding platform! Endless possibilities for girls and boys that love dress up games, crafting & building! description: In this map for Minecraft you will see beautiful and mysterious city named Los Dangeles. In this city were realized all incredible ideas, which you may see in different architecture of numerous cities. Here you will find a lot of beautiful high buildings and even districts of skyscrapers. A lot of houses of small amount of floors. The police station and several hospitals. Across the river, which flows in the city, there are several unique designed bridges. Twin-towers, located in this city, look really beautiful, on the background of the moon and going down sun. There is also an impressive stadium, which looks amazing in the sunlight. In the dark time every player will be amazed by this wonderful beauty in this map for MCPE in the world of Minecraft.If you look at the sky, you will see a lot of planes, which seem to be standing. If you visit the surroundings, you will see a lot of homesteads, both big and small. And in the sky there are also several helicopters. comments: Love the detail of going down to nut and bolts practically to do repairs. Two bones of contention:  The timer to access new barns is too long, does not make for satisfying game play. Also, after purchasing a tool upgrade, I was pleased to see a longer list of repairs gained. Great. Except I couldn't remove the fuel pump to remove the fuel tank. It said my tools needed upgrading for that one part. Please fix that bug so all repairs needed can be made with tool set level.

It's a good game with room for improvement, I've leveled up my tools to level 4 but it's so annoying when it says tools need to be upgraded, this need to be  improved. All so when you fix a vehicle the money could be upped a bit more. I know you can re-paint the vehicle but I wish you could improve the wheels and the interior of the vehicle to make some more money. The other thing that the other paint uses coins how about instead or all so to pay for the other paint with the in game money.

Well let's see ..played the game fixed 7 cars and I made about $70,000 on the game I bought another car and had to replace just about all the parts on it I bought all the parts and was in the process of putting all the parts on it and in the middle of that ,the game shut down on me I opened it back up to continue playing and it had started back over from the beginning at the tutorial and I lost all progress. y'all need to fix this. until this is fixed and or I am put back where I was on the game then I would not recommend downloading this game or any of the other mechanic games for 2018, much less even playing it. it's a waste of time and data also had a trouble with the other 2018 version mechanic game you will see a posting on that one where it's not giving enough time to fix panels and it's not registering clicking on panels to find out if anything's messed up on them .thanks for the problems and the issues. This game is on this phone of mine and the other game is on my other phone developers. You'll see a post on the other garage mechanic 2018 game by Wesley wright. Yaw need to fix these issues ok , because these bad ratings I have been seeing by others isn't looking good for you games.

Game is great but I would've loved some more features or more cars it gets repetitive real fast please add more features like OBD SCAN or inside car customizations also pc version you can change rims and wheels lights bumpers and add more cars not saying you should add all that but maybe some if possible to make it less repetitive

descriptionHTML:
Race your hydroplane powerboat in the ultimate test and crush your friends in multi-player mode in Powerboat Racing now! Powerboat Racing is #1 critically-acclaimed and most popular 3D motorboat racing game.

Powerboat Racing combines excellent visuals and sound with stunning gameplay and head-to-head multi-player competition to create a new type of hydroplane racing experience. This powerboat racer offers an exhilarating mix of wild stunts and intense challenge. As you raced through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds on lakes and rivers, you’ll find yourself struggle to retain control and reach the finish line in record time.

Game Features:
- 8 stages of 40+ challenging levels in Career mode
- Earn coins in Quick-play mode to buy and upgrade vehicles
- Simultaneous multi-player action for up to 4 opponents (supported by Play Game Services)
- Stunning 3D graphics and smooth & realistic boat handling

How to Play:
- Tilt to steer the powerboat
- Touch bottom right gas button to accelerate
- Touch bottom left brake button to slow down

descriptionHTML:
Armored vehicles of SWAT are ready to fight the crime! Choose one of four cars of special forces: Tankario, Megacrusher, The Marauder and Armadillo.

MISSION FOR ELITE RACER

You have spent years for training to serve as a professional member of SWAT special forces. Your role requires a high level of cohesion, expertise and precision. Hot call is made and now it’s time to show up and chase crime!

Your job is immensely dangerous, but you have to push yourself to the limits. Do not be afraid of bombs, heavy balls or stones. Blow them up! Your vehicles are fully equipped and your skills are highly developed. Use your super power to reach criminals just on time! SWAT games are great! Enjoy playing!

AMAZING CAR DRIVING EXPERIENCE

Who said that SWAT games are only about shooting? You have to reach criminals before! While playing this game, you will be always in the center of drama. As a master SWAT car racer you will experience how to overcome rough roads, death loops and burning rings!

TONS OF FUN

Have fun while playing this extraordinary SWAT car driving game! Road fences are not the road limits! Drive with cool cars and do not forget to come back everyday to collect coins.

CONTROL

To control SWAT games is so easy! To balance your car use GO button to drive forward and ARROWS to make cool front and back flips.

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Play this game of special forces and STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control, IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

NOTICE

This fabulous SWAT car driving game is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.

◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB PRODUCTIONS ◆◆◆

Tiny Lab Productions is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search “Tiny Lab Productions” on the app store and discover even more fun games!
