description: World War III: European WarsGeneral. lead your army to the Conquest of Europe in World War 3Epic world war 3 real time strategy game for free! Conquer all Europe!Get ready to fight the deadliest world war 3 battles of the 21st century in bases full of monstrous enemy military base. The rivalry forces have attacked yor base and your base with the military tanks, soldiers, Humvees and Rocket Tanks has turned it into battlefield. The enemies are in the ferocious tanks that are loaded with explosive weapons. You being the general need to destroy the deadly beasts in the best way possible and capture enemy base by totally destroying their military bases.Your European enemies have done an alliance against you and your president decided to invade Europe and USA. However it is very hard to conquer all Europe and USA so very fierce battles waiting for you, General! You will be invading Sweden, Belgium, Holland, Italy, Germany France, England, Turkey, Russia and eventually USA. So, General lead your army very carefully and deploy them wherever you an destroy enemy ground forces.how to play:It is very easy to play the game, click on move / soldier icon to deploy your units and click on pointer to move camera left, right, forward or back. do not forget that if you do not choose move / soldier icon you will not be able to deploy your army.FEATURESFree form quest map that allows players to decide when and where to fight within a historical framework.More than 6 different units all accurately researched and carefully modeled in amazing detail.Almost infinite number of equipment combinations.
descriptionHTML:
World War III: European Wars

General. lead your army to the Conquest of Europe in World War 3

Epic world war 3 real time strategy game for free! Conquer all Europe!

Get ready to fight the deadliest world war 3 battles of the 21st century in bases full of monstrous enemy military base. The rivalry forces have attacked yor base and your base with the military tanks, soldiers, Humvees and Rocket Tanks has turned it into battlefield. The enemies are in the ferocious tanks that are loaded with explosive weapons. You being the general need to destroy the deadly beasts in the best way possible and capture enemy base by totally destroying their military bases.

Your European enemies have done an alliance against you and your president decided to invade Europe and USA. However it is very hard to conquer all Europe and USA so very fierce battles waiting for you, General!

You will be invading Sweden, Belgium, Holland, Italy, Germany France, England, Turkey, Russia and eventually USA. So, General lead your army very carefully and deploy them wherever you an destroy enemy ground forces.

how to play:

It is very easy to play the game, click on move / soldier icon to deploy your units and click on pointer to move camera left, right, forward or back. do not forget that if you do not choose move / soldier icon you will not be able to deploy your army.


FEATURES

Free form quest map that allows players to decide when and where to fight within a historical framework.

More than 6 different units all accurately researched and carefully modeled in amazing detail.

Almost infinite number of equipment combinations.

comments: Great time passer except when you have to get some sleep and you have to do just one more level...me right now! Forced myself to quit. So far not a press for time which is nice. So many match three puts a time limit. So far I see 900 available levels so I'm not sure if time is a factor yet. I hope not. I play to relax. Not get stressed by a clock ticking down on me. They offer coins so you really don't need to purchase if you don't want to. Relaxing and challenging at the same time. Good game to get.

I have really been enjoying playing this game. Some of the levels I've been flying through. I like that you don't have to wait 24 hours if you decide not to purchase anything. But now I am stuck on level 184 and I have no clue how to get out of it. I did have a couple of levels where I saw a pop-up that said I'm now a tester. After that I was able to move the flowers anyway I wanted. I wish I had that now because a few more tries and I'm going to uninstall this game.

You don't have to wait for lives to refill which is the biggest upside.  Ads always seem to come up after your out of moves for the level but before you click okay to move to the next level (so I have lost my progress on a level before). Strategic game play that's good for passing the time but keeping your mind engaged.

Updating for the 3rd time. Love the music but going to uninstall bc of level 652. Wish the sorry, meant Winter not Harvest blitz had the same background music, but ... Oh well. I'll find another developer.  Wth is up with level 652!? This is impossible!!!!! Graphics could be a tad bit better, but overall it's ok. I like not having to wait for lives in order to continue to play, sweet! The ads aren't so bad, just click back as began & it's all good.  My most favorite part of this game ... drumroll ü•Å ... the music. üéµüé∑Classical instrumental jazzüé∑üéπüé∂    Almost forgot, how would players know flowers can be swapped within the bubbles? Bc some bubbles cannot be swappedü§î

This game is very addictive & fun BUT, when u get to level 652, that's where ALL the fun stops. How in the hell are we supposed to rescue 48 garden critters with only "13" freakin' moves. Need at least 30 moves. Oh & please do something about all those SAME ads that keeps popping up. Smh.

Too many ads. There is an ad at the bottom of the screen during game play. The ads sometimes flash and disrupt the game. There is also a 5 second ad after each level. Also the scoring is messed up. Had 20 moves and solved the game in two moves, so you would think the final score would give 3 stars, nope only 1 star.  The only positive thing about this game is that the flowers are pretty.
description: Blossom Blitz Match 3 is an addicting and fun puzzle game, free to play straight on your Android or Tablet device. Spend a relaxing day at the lovely flower garden, explore hundreds of beautiful levels, blast colorful flowers and win levels. This completely addictive Blossom Blitz Match 3 game will keep you occupied for hours!Link the flowers and blast your way through hundreds of amazing match-3 levels filled with amazing graphics, unique items and splendid boosters. Clear the garden, and beat the challenges in this awesome puzzle adventure. Try it out now and get ready to enjoy the amazing matching game full of beautiful flowers. Play this fun game that will take you on the most wonderful journey! Create special combos to get a cool explosion!- Match 4 flowers to get a striped item of this color and create a line blast.- Match 5 lovely items in an L or T form to get a bomb that will explode surrounding items. - Match 5 colorful figures in a row to get a rainbow blast. Why you‚Äôll like it:üå∏  Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations.üå∏Addictive gameplay: swap and match the bright flowers, and be part of a breath-taking adventure!üå∏Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that‚Äôs easy to learn but challenging to master.üå∏ Hundreds fun and exciting levels.üå∏ Beautiful graphics and effects.üå∏ There is no life or time limit, so you can play as much as you like. üå∏ Completely FREE, download today to your Android or Tablet device and match your way to victory.üå∏ Never ending match-3 fun!Clear the board from all the colorful buds and items and win levels! Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every blooming level.  Play this incredible puzzle today, and get ready for an addictive ride. Play now, link 3 beautiful flowers, create amazing combinations and solve the brain teasers to blast them away and win exciting rewards! With so many exciting levels, awesome boosters and bonuses, Blossom Blitz match-3 game is a must have for your Android device. Play this addictive match 3 game and experience endless hours of fun and fascination!

Uncover the keyhole of the prison walls and adventures in it with Prison!In this role-playing multiplayer game there are many police cars: black with flashing lights, everything is as it should be. Hard-to-manage horses are also at your disposal. Imagine that you are a real cop. Or maybe on this multiplayer role-playing map MCPE you prefer to be a criminal and make an escape. Since the game is role-playing and multiplayer, invite friends, divide into teams and choose who will be the cop, and who will make an escape in the sandbox of Minecraft. UPDATE: I was hoping that the issues with the tracks will be fixed in this update but alas no joy. Reducing from 3 to 1 star.   Game is quite good but the developers have made it very challenging to get new tracks which makes an otherwise fantastic game very redundant. To the developers: you are already making money off the ads why dont you improve the gameplay to give out tracks faster. Also there should be an option to buy new types of trains using the stars earned apart from real money.

Good game but has some bugs and needs some economy improvements. It's pretty slow getting new tile pieces. One free tile a day isn't that great. There should also be a coin bonus multiplyer for playing levels on higher difficullties. Especially since the amount of coins needed to get another piece continually goes up after each piece you earn

The Voxel Agents have struck gold yet again! I played Train Conductor 2 for a long time... Looks like i can play this one forever! I love the diversity in locations and the daily special events. No two challenges are the same. It's as hard to play as you want it to be or as easy as you need it to be. I absolutely love this game!

I love this game, a lot of fun when I need to disconnect from work.  But when I am forced to watch an ad just to get back to the map or between levels it just becomes annoying and seems desperate.  Now if I crash and want it undone sure I expect an ad but just to finish a level and get back to the map.....ffs!

My 4 year old grandson plays this , but u raise his score to get tiles every day and give useless wooden tiles when the game knows he needs allow to go over water. Even when u save up metal ones and trade it gives u useless curves  instead of straight peices.  Come on game people it's supposed to be for fun.
description: Train Conductor World is a high-speed train traversal puzzler; trundle, turn and track in this spectacular European adventure!Conduct and control the tracks, manage movement and watch your rail network grow. You‚Äôll need nerves of steel and snappy strategy to keep the chaos under control. Be on high-alert for explosive crashes, near-misses and split second situations..Adventure across new terrain and connect the wonders of the European continent. Your trains will be barreling across the canals of Amsterdam, zooming around the Arc De Triomphe in Paris and navigating the perilous peak of the Matterhorn.Customise your trains to optimise your railway - use rocket boosters, star medallions and more to speed up your deliveries. It all counts when you‚Äôre growing the biggest railway in the world!The best train game around! descriptionHTML:
Sleep all day, PARTY ALL NIGHT! Enjoy holidays break on summer high school vacation camp in a paradise! Bay watch won’t stop you from being a beach party king at the hottest beach on Earth! Music, dancing, crafting & building!

Time for a summer high school adventure!
Imagine a paradise island: warm nights, hot beaches, cute girls and handsome boys… It’s all here in Beach Party Craft! Experience an unique mix of crafting & building games with fashion games, music games and dancing games! Start your high school music adventure with crafting & building your own world (from blueprints!) or look for fun in the paradise island of Beach Party Craft! Sea adventure begins!

Are you ready for the hottest beach party on Earth?
Beach Party Craft isn’t only about crafting & building. It’s one of the best party games, but before you go wild like a party animal, make some preparations! Go shopping and change your clothes - it’s not a fashion runway, but not a pool party too! Dress up, add some makeup, visit nail salon and spa, look for famous hair salon of Coco. Games for girls are usually plain simple, but Beach Party Craft isn’t! If you want to amuse your best high school friends, boyfriend or girlfriend, you MUST dress up like a star. Dancing queen or king is going to be yours!

Enjoy the nightlife
In Beach Party Craft you will find other party fun fans! Meet with friends from high school or last dorm party, then chat with your high school crush! But don’t waste your time on some high school romance like in many casual games for girls. Instead, look for single boys and girls - craft your own love story. Find a hip hop dancing queen like Elsa or a disco girl of your dreams like Nikki. Have fun in the theme park and become the best friends or maybe even a girlfriend and boyfriend!

Sea adventure awaits
Tired of beach party? Build yourself a fishing boat or… a glamorous yacht! Launch the sea safari and invite your high school friends or even a… mermaid! Craft, build and design - make the best yacht party on the ocean! Craft the best vacation ever - only in Beach Party Craft!

CORE FEATURES:
• Crafting & building party city!
• Become a party king at every beach party!
• Listen disco or hip hop music and find the best dance moves!
• Impress boys and girls, craft your own story!
• Find a boyfriend or girlfriend. Love story without high school romance!
• Amuse yourself in the best theme park by the sea!

UPCOMING FEATURES:
• Multi Craft - multiplayer mode!
• More clothes to dress up!
• More dance moves!
• More blocks!

The hottest beach on a paradise island and the hottest beach party in the fashion world awaits in Beach Party Craft! Crafting & building games meet music games and dancing games in one of the best of casual games for girls of 2017! This vacation you just can’t miss this summer camp. Sit back, relax and DRESS UP your mobile phone with the best beach game for girls and boys! FOR FREE!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Crafting & building! Dress up & dance! Sea adventure - crazy beach party games
title: Beach Party Craft: Summer High School Adventure

If you're looking for a way to kill time, my government class feels like it's only a few minutes long with this game. And thanks to wifi direct, I can play with my friend across the room from me. descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

Follow Us
Twitter: @ChillyRoom
Facebook: @chillyroomsoulknight

* To use the screen recording function, permission to write to external storage is required.

comments: Yeyah! I love getting to be the necromancer! You immediately get thrusted into a position of great power, without explanation. Now, it worked well here, cuz it fit the rest of the game nicely. I remember hearing once that "Story in video games is like story in (elicit film). It's expected to be there, but nobody cares about it." You don't expect much, so what you get is nice. There's a certain lack of care as you play, like the cold pusher of the dead, you are. The feeling of progress really ramps up once the player can raise a second minion, and it's great! You get exactly what it seems like, which is something to behold at the moment.

This game..is something else. I love the game, eerie and mystical, but I sometimes have trouble pressing the attack and defense buttons. Like, they don't work too well. Also, for each level, could you make different backgrounds? That would be great. All-in-all, this game is great!

Travel back in time, betrayal, go to hell etc and also, the main character is irritatingly stupid. Like.. his IQ is a negative. Not sure if this is intentional, but still.. Good game!

This one is built with love. Good ol fashioned fun with funny script and a simple but meaningful skill build and equipment progression.   Really enjoying the story. This is a refreshing departure from the cookie cutter for adventure games out there designed to get you addicted and spending money. I'm more than happy to pay a few bucks to support this game of my own volition.

Right now I have been trying to figure out what my friends time zone is so I changed the time and time zone,  and I thought all was well. Unfortunately, when I got back onto Dash Tag I still had my unlocked pet, Smoky, as my character but it gave me the tutorial pop up. When I closed the game's tab and reopened the game, it had Sparky and I had lost all my coins, gems, and pets. Please help, it would be appreciated! Thanks!

Hello Wildworks! Please read this! I have recently downloaded the game on my Chromebook, which is the only android I own that has the Play Store on it. It would be easier for me if I could get it on my Kindle Fire. Please make Dash Tap avalible to the amazon app store as soon as possible! I would rate 5 stars on there, otherwise my review is a 4 stars. In otherwords, the game is great! It isn't as challenging for me since I already play many games that are like this. Since it's more challenging on the chromebook, I'm still stuck on the first pet you have at the start.  As I said before, please make the app avalible for the amazon app store soon! Thank you!

Although the game is fun, cute, and addicting, there are some things that don't really function. For instance, I'll watch an ad (particularly an ad for deal dash) and it won't continue my round. It works for all ads except deal dash. It also has some obstacles in the Coral canyons setting that are difficult to pass. Ideally, most people playing the game are young at age and I personally feel like the game is a little bit too hard. Overall, it's a good game, but I think some adjustments are necessary.

PETS ON THE LOOSE!

Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha!

So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!

description: We all known that all girls wants to look like a real princess for New Year party, so we think that our newest makeup games called Princess Makeup New Year Style will give you the chance to imagine how can you change your look for this big party !All little girls must known that for a perfect look the first step is to have a perfect skin. For this reason we will invite you in our virtual makeup salon, where you may find everything you need for a beauty treatment, like in a real beauty salon : soft creams for a beauty salon , nice mask for the eyes and more cosmetics for a nice skin.After this makeover level, we will bring you in a colorful world of our makeup games. At the end of this part of our princess makeup games you will have the perfect makeup for New Year evening.Of course that you must have gorgeous dresses if you want to look like a beautiful princess . description: Teachers are eaten by zombies!  There are no rules in this chaotic school!FIGHT for RESPECT in this Online Multiplayer School game.  Make friends!  Train hard!  Gear up!  It's the survival of the fittest!Introduction:This is the beginning of a very fun and exciting MMORPG journey.  The journey starts off at a school that has become chaotic.  The teachers are gone.  Probably eaten by zombies... Now the kids are free to do what they please!  Sounds like fun?  But wait... There are consequences that come with not having any authorities around.  Bullies used to back off when a teacher walks by.  What happens now?  What would you do in such a school?  It seems that we're back to the basics where it comes down to the survival of the fittest!Features:‚Ä¢ Play with thousands of online gamers‚Ä¢ Quest Maker - allowing you to make your own quests for others to play‚Ä¢ 3D Open world sandbox environment allows you to free roam an entire school‚Ä¢ Fully customize your character with over 5 billion different possibilities‚Ä¢ Real-time market that enables true economy‚Ä¢ Over 30 different fighting moves to crush your enemies with in real-time‚Ä¢ Loads of weapons and armors to aid you along your journey‚Ä¢ Upgrade your equipment to make them more powerful‚Ä¢ Meet friends, or enemies‚Ä¢ Create or join a clan to wage wars‚Ä¢ Buy houses, furniture, then throw a house party with friends‚Ä¢ Buy pets and train them to fight for you‚Ä¢ Craft rare items of various types‚Ä¢ Actively under development which means this game will evolve greatly to meet your MMORPG desires   TROUBLE?** If the game is SLOW or FREEZES at the start, please reboot your device to free up more memory to play the game. Any problems please leave a detailed description in the developer support below so we can get back to you.  Thanks! **
descriptionHTML:
Teachers are eaten by zombies! There are no rules in this chaotic school!

FIGHT for RESPECT in this Online Multiplayer School game.
Make friends! Train hard! Gear up! It's the survival of the fittest!


Introduction:

This is the beginning of a very fun and exciting MMORPG journey. The journey starts off at a school that has become chaotic. The teachers are gone. Probably eaten by zombies... Now the kids are free to do what they please! Sounds like fun?

But wait... There are consequences that come with not having any authorities around. Bullies used to back off when a teacher walks by. What happens now? What would you do in such a school? It seems that we're back to the basics where it comes down to the survival of the fittest!


Features:

• Play with thousands of online gamers
• Quest Maker - allowing you to make your own quests for others to play
• 3D Open world sandbox environment allows you to free roam an entire school
• Fully customize your character with over 5 billion different possibilities
• Real-time market that enables true economy
• Over 30 different fighting moves to crush your enemies with in real-time
• Loads of weapons and armors to aid you along your journey
• Upgrade your equipment to make them more powerful
• Meet friends, or enemies
• Create or join a clan to wage wars
• Buy houses, furniture, then throw a house party with friends
• Buy pets and train them to fight for you
• Craft rare items of various types
• Actively under development which means this game will evolve greatly to meet your MMORPG desires


TROUBLE?

** If the game is SLOW or FREEZES at the start, please reboot your device to free up more memory to play the game. Any problems please leave a detailed description in the developer support below so we can get back to you. Thanks! **
developerAddress:
1420 West Georgia St
Vancouver BC
V6G 3K4
summary: The #1 Multiplayer Online School Game!
title: School of Chaos Online MMORPG

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a dangerous amusing, wild and overwhelming trip to Sin City!
Enjoy what Vegas offers by shooting rival gangs and stealing cars to run around the strip, pushing your fortune into the casino and personalizing your topics. You can even fly into the sky as long as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

ABOUT NEEDS

* Kill the zombies, try to fly with robots and even fight with the shadow clans of HELL, while your story takes you to incredible places.

WELCOME TO EXTERNAL GANG CITY AUTO
* Play the battle with martial arts (MMA), whose dreams of the Grand Champion Battle Royale face the world of thefts, gangs, zombies, etc. In the BLOCKBUSTER STORY mode.
* Fight through 80 missions, full of action, auto racing, shooting and much more. Use your skills and your brain to cope with any task that you throw at you.
* Create clans of criminals to knock out from the shadows against your numerous enemies.

FREE PLANE
* Explore BIG CITY, 9 times more than the previous gangster game, for a ridiculously complex mobile world where you always need to do something and commit theft.
* Perform tricks with Ragdoll effects that are so successful that they are successful because they are terribly failing because of the amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
* Watch your name in the rating, as you overcome such problems as air, water and street patrols, MMA battles, FPS openings and much more!
* Become the best sniper from Vegas, shooting him in Carnage & Heist mode.
* Break the pot, killing them in exciting CASINO games. Theft is not the only way to make big money!

SEE ON THE WILD SIDE
* Access to crazy weapons, like Molotov cocktails, long sniper rifles, flames and electric guitar! Choose the right one to face the threat.
* Stay mobile while driving CRAZY VEHICLES, including monsters of trucks, muscle cars, tanks and combat aircraft. So look - there is no autopilot for these dogs of war!
* Improve your skills for smarter theft, sharper hedgehogs and better control of the race car.
* Customize your equipment and look like everything you want: a mechanized robot, a boxing champion, a zombie, etc.


HISTORY:
In this shooter game from a third party, you play as a grandiose MMA champion. Substituted by the mafia, you must quit your battle against the fighting event of the year. But if your opponent hits you and hits the bat first, the ideal plan for the famous partisan Frank Velano is also there. You've just become the most wanted person in the city. In the canine world of dogs, where crimes are everywhere, you need to keep weapons to fight the wildest gait of all time!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fate is made, and life is lost with a roll of the cube!

For fans of FPS actions, authors, cars (cars or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with theft of cars and free mobile games.
summary: Get ready for a dangerous amusing, wild and overwhelming trip to Sin City!
title: The Gang Auto

comments: Amazing addictive game. Try it out! Not too many ads, and just the right amount of challenge without pulling your hair out. Sometimes there's a hidden dot in the title, or ones that are almost the same color as the background, but it's not bad enough to lose a star.

Updated with no fix...  problem still persists.  No exit button and controls for the back button are very wonky. Need to add dedicated exit button or fix what happens when you tap / swipe the blank park of the screen. Trying to bring the controls up from their hidden state selects options is frustrating. You end up starting games. Very unpolished controls, imo.

Cool game, only bad thing is that tutorial levels are rated as bronze so you can never have all gold.. I tried doing the same tutorial three times in a row, then it is counted as gold, but when you exit the game and enter again that it is bronze again

Interesting puzzle type game.  Using rope is a bit challenging on small screens.  It used way too much background data which is not have related at all.  My phone gets hot when using the app.  Uninstalling
Different and fun. Not too hard but still challenging.  Daily challenges are impossible to complete though (bug?) , so don't bother with them (hence my only giving 3 stars)

This right here is a work of genius.  My only wish is for an undo button, for when you accidentally touch a part of the screen and it places a spot/cut/bridge in an unwinnable spot.  Especially annoying during daily challenge that you can't re-do.  Also, I would like to be able to retry any level, such as the daily or randoms, even if it wouldn't "count". I'm convinced every so often there is an unwinable level, but you can't even test it or let the devs know because once you fail it goes away permanently.  Still, a great, great game... I really hope there is a V2 some day.
description: Lines ‚Äì Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. descriptionHTML:
Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!
How to play Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle
Depending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!

Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:
- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix
- Daily Challenges
- 26 achievements to unlock
-250 smart levels
- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions
- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.
- Infinite fun!

Point Mode
Tap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.

Eraser Mode
Tap over an opponent´s dot to erase it.

Draw Mode
Draw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!

Cut Mode
Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent´s color.

Hope you all guys enjoy Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!

Please make matchmaking only put same arena people against each other.

comments: One of the best games out there!  The only thing I would change is the placement of the power tools as I will often activate one when killing a zombie. Great work!  Hope there is a version II coming out soon!  Cheers! ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ  I've sent an email to the devs about no bonus brains in survival mode but after uninstall/reinstall there was the odd one popping up; however I feel there should be more to reward the player.  Cheers what up devs I didn't play for a few weeks and my progress and settings where wiped out...I started playing zombie smacker...are you the same devs???

Love this game but can be frustrating when I hit the zombies and they keep going and I lose the game. After a while I have to stop as I get too excited. I hate the hiding construction workers. If I don't knock them out at the top of the screen, they get too low down and I miss them. Hate it when I accidentally hit the people when the game throws everything at you. I have a super fast finger, but, sometimes not fast enough. It takes concentration and fast reflexes to advance in this game. I gave it 5 stars.  Might go and read the help section for tips. All I want to say is try it.
Not the most fun. A small mistake can kill you. The bonuses aren't that helpful. Challenging. Advertisements every time you open the game.

descriptionHTML:
Zombie Smasher is the #1 addicting and entertaining game available on Google Play.

Get ready to defend your home as a mob of zombies is about to invade your town! Those undead creatures are back, and it's up to you to keep them brainless. Use your finger to tap on the zombies to smash and eliminate them before they break down your door.

How to Play:
- Simply touch the zombies to kill them
- Don't hit the kids surfers from neighborhood
- Use the special power-ups wisely

Game Features:
- Story Mode (60 levels and more to come), Survival Mode, Time Mode
- 7 totally terrifying enemy zombie breeds (normal, dog, oilworker, timberman, ghost, baby & fat boss)
- Amazing visuals & immersive CD quality audio
- Intense zombie-blasting action game play fit for subway time

comments: The perfect game Good graphics, unique control method and awesome hero balance. I heard that some players experience fps lagh issues after 5v5 update, but im playing right now with around 80-100 fps. And this game has such a unique controls, different than other moba like Mobile legends, and some players arent used to the tap control... but please, the tap control is the main reason why i play and love vainglory, dont make the game turns out into another "moba analog" thing. Overall, perfect game

The main reason I stopped playing this game 11 months ago was because of the limited variety to the game. Since then they have added more Champions and finally the 5v5 map as well as a few cool gameplay modes. I think it really made the game much more interesting they still could use a few more Champions but no more than 50. This isn't league many more than that is overwhelming

The new update making my phone heating a lot & drain the battery so fast. Is it because of the frame rate? I don't know. But, Can you make the frame rates a little lighter in setting or do something about it ? Sorry I should uninstall it for a while, your game was too good for my device. Keep updating your game, maybe I'll be back.

Its a great game on its own. Graphics are so good, controls are butter smooth. One issue I have is that they took away guild chat. Its also not possible to ask players for a game while said player is mid game anymore. I know semc is trying to keep communications to a minimum but..these changes make it hard for any sort of teaming. Unless you and your guild mates just so happen to be online AND not in a game. Would really like these back honestly.

Dear Developer,  Hello there, Please Help me. Event with New update i still cant play on 5vs5 mode bot or casual. Please help to fix it, as your recomend setting im playing on low and still have forceclose issue after loading screen & back restart the app. Im using Samsung Galaxy Note Edge. Im gonna give 5 or 6 star if its issue fix üòÜ  Ps: im still can playing all mode smoothly, except 5vs5 mode.  Regards. Me.

I've known Vainglory for a long time but never had a chance to give it a try.   I was playing the other mobile moba game since then, but when I heard that Vainglory has finally released its 5v5 mode, I'll make sure to give it a try. Oh what a best decision I've made.   But, if there is a feature to manually build the items for our heroes outside the game that would be very helpful. The control method is also great but it will take some more time for me to get use to it. Overall it's a great game üëè.
description: Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp‚Äôs Vainglory 5V5 is the only ‚Äúno-compromises‚Äù MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile. Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience. At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform ‚Äî and the most fun you‚Äôve ever had playing on a mobile device. If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:- Real line-of-sight Fog of War- 120 FPS pro-motion support- Skill-based play & decision-making- Macro & rotational strategies- Objective-rich 3-lane map- Free Camera- Last-hitting- Wave Control- Lane Teleports- Active items- Intricate vision system- Original fantasy characters and storytellingVainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.----------------------"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." ‚ÄîIGN‚ÄúBest Mobile Game‚Äù ‚Äî2016 Global Mobile Awards‚ÄúSome of the best visuals seen on the App Store.‚Äù ‚ÄîMacworld UK----------------------Features:== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you‚Äôre ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you‚Äôll love ‚Äî along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory‚Äôs game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can‚Äôt select the target, Vainglory‚Äôs pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you‚Äôll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease. == Guilds & Teams ==Need someone to play with? Vainglory‚Äôs built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.== Chests & Quests ==Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you‚Äôre lucky, you‚Äôll hit one of the many massive jackpots.== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you‚Äôve ever seen ‚Äî and if you‚Äôre the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!== Vibrant Community ==Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.----------------------Twitter: https://twitter.com/vaingloryReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/vainglorygameFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/vainglorygameTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vainglory
descriptionHTML:
Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile.

Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience.

At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device.

If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.

THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:

- Real line-of-sight Fog of War
- 120 FPS pro-motion support
- Skill-based play & decision-making
- Macro & rotational strategies
- Objective-rich 3-lane map
- Free Camera
- Last-hitting
- Wave Control
- Lane Teleports
- Active items
- Intricate vision system
- Original fantasy characters and storytelling

Vainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.

----------------------

"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN

“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards

“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK

----------------------

Features:

== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==
Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.

== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==
Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.

== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==
Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease.

== Guilds & Teams ==
Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.

== Chests & Quests ==
Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.

== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==
Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!

== Vibrant Community ==
Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.

----------------------

Get help from farm animals to aim, shoot, and pop all the bubbles in this FREE to play bubble ball shooter game!


Blast away in the bubble pop adventure with CoCo and her bubble shooter cannon!


BUBBLE COCO features the following:
🐥Bubble popping, bubble shooting fever!
Bubble CoCo combines a classic bubble shooter arcade game with fun power up items and various game modes in hundreds of levels! More than 1200 levels are waiting to challenge your bubble shooting skills!


🐥Boosters and modes to entertain all!
Bubble CoCo is a bubble game with a captivating challenge! Addictive game modes, helpful booster buble, and constant NEW game level updates so you can enjoy never ending bubble games!


🐥Easy, intuitive control!
Bubble CoCo is as easy has 1, 2, 3! Aim, shoot, and pop the bubble! The power of the bubble shooter is right at your fingertips! Not one stray lost bubble under CoCo's watch! Fire that red bubble ball to the top!


🐥New game EVENTS and rewards!
Bubble CoCo will hold fun game events everyone can enjoy, such as the Egg Festival! Participate in new events so you can earn rewards for your bubble pop adventure!


🐥Play with or without friends!
Send gifts, request help, and compete against friends to see who is the best hand at the bubble shooter! Bubble CoCo is also playable WITHOUT an internet connection, so you can continue your bubble blitz bubble games anytime, anywhere!


🐥Colorful and vibrant graphics!
Looking for free bubble pop games with rich colors and cute characters? Beautiful bubble whirl graphics with bubblegum pink, rich red, blues and purple! Check out the eye popping, bubble popping Bubble CoCo now! Blast bubbles through appropriate color match! These bubles are asking to be popped! Bubble CoCo is the cute bubble game you are looking for!


🐥No eggs left behind!
Help CoCo the chicken protect her eggs! The mother hen will be nothing short of angry if she gets her eggs stolen! We don't want Mr. Fox getting his hands on a precious egg, do we? Blast the bubbles in this shooter match 3 game!


🐥The best bubble game for you!
We are talking about the best bubble game for kids and family! Not just the best matching games for adults, but also matching games for kids! Blast away boredom with the best bubble shooter game! Looking for free bubble games? Go on your very own bubble pop adventure with CoCo's baby birds and farm animal friends! You won't need to search for any other free bubble games!


-----------------------------------------
Look out for Bubble CoCo's Bubble Shooter news and events on the official fan page:
https://www.facebook.com/playbubblecoco


Visit the Bubble CoCo Help Center: http://www.bit.ly/BC_help

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. description: My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is ‚Äî‚Äî a werewolf!And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.Features:- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it‚Äôs a secret old house behind our high school!- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!- Bella finds a diary here! There‚Äôs a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says ‚ÄúZ&V, 1918‚Äù. What was happening here one hundred years ago?- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?- The third room is a bathroom. Bella‚Äôs hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit! - Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!And so much more are waiting for you to find out at SECRET HIGH SCHOOL!Wanna have more fun? We would love to hear from you!Find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Beauty-Salon-Games-1094161030602834/For more information about Beauty Salon Games, please visit http://www.beautysalongames.net/
descriptionHTML:
My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!

Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is —— a werewolf!

And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!

A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.


Features:
- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it’s a secret old house behind our high school!
- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!
- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!
- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!
- Bella finds a diary here! There’s a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says “Z&V, 1918”. What was happening here one hundred years ago?
- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?
- The third room is a bathroom. Bella’s hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit!
- Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!
- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!

And so much more are waiting for you to find out at SECRET HIGH SCHOOL!

Wanna have more fun? We would love to hear from you!
Find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Beauty-Salon-Games-1094161030602834/
For more information about Beauty Salon Games, please visit http://www.beautysalongames.net/
summary: Secret High 8 is back! Does Zac have another girlfriend behind Bella‚Äôs back?
title: Secret High School 8: 100 Years Love Story Diaries

comments: This game is very amazing, and accurate with everything! The slopes, obstacles, color changes, and the points all seem accurate to any song. Like how it does work with any mp3. Small problems with songs with lyrics, but I do not listen to much of those anyways (I take that back there is no problem actually). It is amazing! I would really be appreciated if you made more styles AbstractArt! Great especially for a unity made mobile game.

it was love at first sight. beutiful visuals that match each song perfectly. a simple but adictive game that i cant recommend enough. a fair warning though, if you have visual epilepsy DO NOT play this game for it has strong flashing lights

My first thought when I opened uo the game and saw that it was made in unity I was expecting a broken half assed game. However, this game is crafted very well. Amazing effects for the sound pitches of the music played and the screen shake makes you really feel the music. For the car selection its pretty good. But personally, I would reccomend only including cars from the 70s to 90s. Since i'm guessing you're going with a vaporwave vibe, a modern car such as the jaguar isn't really the best thing in my opinion. Cars I would reccomend would be the Lamborghini Diablo, Ferrari Testarossa, Ferrari 348TB, any classic Porsche 911, ofcourse the delorean and any other 80s retro car.

Many games I play on a mobile device either start out lame or end up lame. But this is game gives me more joy than many other games combined. Its a masterpiece, now slap a price tag on it to make it worth your while. Good luck, AbstractArt.

I overally love the game itself, it just lack a bit if features. For example: -Song search -Difficulty settings -Speed settings Add these, and you have an awesome rhythm based racing game on mobile. The Devs did a great job.
Surprisingly awesome! Got it after seeing Neon Drive gameplay. Only problem is that when u hit a column, the screen flashes too long. I end up hitting more and more because I can't see.

description: Goku, the Dragon Boy Fighter Z and Vegeta, the Ultra Saiyan is on quest to defeat Master Jiren, the Champion of Justice Warrior on another universe.Goku is a Saiyan hero with powerful body and ready to fight any challenger. Goku loves fighting and has mastered martial arts such as taekwondo, kickboxing, kungfu and many more, thanks to Master Roshi who trained many Z Fighters. Goku need to master many more forms such as Super Saiyan and Super Saiyan God Blue in order to finish the quest to defeat the all-powerful master Jiren. Goku will also train with Vegeta in order to get stronger.Vegeta was an evil Saiyan with bad intention to destroy other planets. But after being defeated by Goku in an epic and intense all-out battle, he too became a defender of good and joined Goku in his quest to defeat Master Jiren. Vegeta's strength comes from mastering the power of saiyan ki. His ability in manipulating saiyan ki and hakai energies is second to none. In his quest to defeat the Champion of Justice Warrior, he must master the powers of Super Saiyan energies and become Super Vegeta. That's not all though, there's one more level of power told only in Saiyan legends, the power of Ultra Instinct Blue can ascend a Saiyan into Ultra Instinct Blue Ultra God Saiyan who can defeat any foe!But, Master Jiren is no pushover! His title of Champion Warrior of Justice means that he is his universe's most powerful warrior. With his army of Saibamen at his side, he will fight to his very last breath and engage both Dragon Boy Super Saiyan Blue God Goku and Ultra Instinct Warrior Blue Ultra God Saiyan Vegeta in an epic and drawn-out supreme battle arena combat action!Can you complete your training then come out on top and defeat Master Jiren, Champion Warrior and Hero of justice in the Tournament of Power of 2018? Defeat him and be the best Z Fighter in the multi universe and make Lord Beerus proud of you! Find out now and defeat them all in Super Saiyan God Goku v Ultra Instinct Blue Vegeta!Features:- Ultra awesome 2D graphics- Best fighting game of 2017 and 2018- Super smooth gameplay- Ability to utilize many skills such as Kamehameha, Godly Ki, Ki Blast, and many more- Super ultra epic full multi combat action- Play as both God Goku and Ultra Instinct Vegeta- Super epic ultimate boss, the Master and Hero of Justice, Jiren!- Completely free and completely awesomeAnd as always, don't forget to check our other Z-riffic games at Gunaga!

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Please add new cars and other ways to earn money. Customizable characters would be better so people can have unique avatars. Most importantly, please add a variety of maps to choose from and different game modes. ( boring )

descriptionHTML:
DRAGON BATTLE FIGHT HERO SHADOW: Super Heroes Battle of the Dragon is a free action fullscreen action game and offline game that is optimized for all android phones, tablets, mobile phones and free download on Google Play Store.

In order to become a man superhero warriors who takes on the responsibility of rescuing the Earth, the player must immerse himself in the character and have the proper tactics to survive and become stronger in battle.

In order to win, you have to increase your strength in each level because your opponent will grow stronger and have better skills. If you want to have unrivaled power, collect all seven or seven of the dragon's gems in spider ball shadow quickly complete your mission.

On the screen you will be given the story of Son Goku (Sanku) or Vegeta (Geta), two legendary characters with classics power 20 levels G.SSJ 1, G.SSJ 2, GSSJ 3, GSSJ 4, G.SSJ 5 ... G.SSJ 20. You have to upgrade your power through each level to get through all the awesome BOSSs and win the last one.
The game is really fun and entertaining, whether you are male or female, boy or girl, under 18 or more, adult or young are able to play the game very easily. You can play games anywhere, such as flying a plane, doing shooting, gold digging, riding a train, or in the office, cooking ... can play games.

--------------------Function---------------------------

- Upgrading power from a to z G.SSJ 1 to G.SSJ 20
- Get bonuses, gold and bean spirit during the game.
- Receiving diamonds at the end of the game
- Watch videos to get coins and diamonds anywhere
- Watch video to X2 coins
- Buy the ingame IAP package to X2 coins throughout the game's lifecycle.
- Share achievements online on facebook, twitter, intagram ...
- Amazing 3D graphics, vivid sound that delivers great gaming experience.

----------------------- System Character & Skill --------------------- -------

- Goku has many advanced techniques but the most prominent is Kamehameha
- 20 levels super saiyan (super xayda)
- Vegeta is later the same mother and half brother with goku protecting the earth. The skill is to shoot ashore.

- The two brothers own 20 super saiyan levels from G.SSJ 1, G.SSJ 2, SSJ 3 ... G.SSJ 20 with the power of classic landslide.

- Son Gohan vs trunks will be appearing at next update.

descriptionHTML:
Long Description
THE FATE OF MANKIND
The year is 2880, Planet earth can no longer support life, The Current colony of Mankind resides in Interstellar space stations scattered all over the solar system, Astronauts are the new bearers of Noah’s Ark Survival. “Colonize Space”, the name of the mission. Bear the hopes and dreams of humanity as you embark on quest for Interstellar Space Survival.

PLAY FOR FREE
Welcome Space Traveler, here you will experience a unique space construction simulator game. Control Astronauts as they construct a Space Frontier in the planet mars. Build a Space Colony, become part of a galactic colonization force, as you aid the survival mission of mankind. Drive the mars survival rover, Space Excavator, Space shuttle, space crane and many more amazing space vehicles as you build the Space City, Construction Simulation at it’s finest.

CONSTRUCTION SIMULATOR
From the Studio that brought you the highly acclaimed game, “House Construction Simulator” and “Bridge Construction Simulator” here comes the next in the series of Construction Simulators, The Ultimate “Space Construction Simulator: Mars Colony Survival”. Yes, we heard you, you love construction games, so we constructed for you another one. This one is for our users who love city building games, space games and tunnel construction games.

STORY OF SURVIVAL
Command Center to Mars Explorer, “Come in, Mars Explorer. How goes Project Noah’s Ark Survival. What is the Status of Colonization Protocol.”
Mars Explorer, “We have successfully landed on Mars surface, Martian 1 is loading the Mars Rover. Looking for a suitable place to set up Space Construction HQ. Beginning Colonization Protocol”.
Martian 1 ,“Excavator, Crane and Mars Rover are all in position. Survival Mission Initiated.”

MANY VEHICLES TO CONTROL
Learn to master Driving in 0.5g, Realistic Low Gravity simulation. True Exploration missions Operate Heavy Machinery in the solar system on other planets. Use
- Mars Rover
- Excavator
- Mobile Crane
- Path Paver
- Heavy truck
- Forklift
- Bulldozer


We at FlipWired 3D games, pride ourselves in the quality of our 3D Games, we make Action, Simulation, Survival and Adventure 3D Games. If ever there is a problem in our games, we would love to hear about it in an email.
summary: Gear up for space survival, initiate mars colonization, build a space station!
title: Space Construction Simulator-Mars Colony Survival

comments: Great game. First turn based strategy game that I have enjoyed in a long time. There is no dumb energy bar that you have to wait to refill which is amazing.  Also there are no ads unless you voluntarily watch one to get a bonus to a chest. The only thing I wish was different is that the player could unlock multiple chest at once. It's quite slow to open chests as it is and it would be awesome to be able to unlock more chests at the same time. Overall it's a great game with a bright future. I would definitely recommend getting it.

Just downloaded. Like what I see so far and can play casually. No ads interfering with game play. Hope to see some strategic maps in the future. I'll change my review once I get to know the game better. This is definitely NOT one of those ridiculous grindfest mobile games. There's gaming consoles and PC's for that nonsense.
I just installed your f game and i give you this rewiew. I dont know how much you pay for your adds but your game sucks!!!
Great turn-based tactical game. I think the dropships are bugged though... Whenever I use them on a team, the game starts to rubber band between my turn and the opponent, resetting my turn's actions.

The concept is great, and I love the idea you put into it. Id continue playing more if there were a few tweaks done. It took 5 minutes (literally) to match up to someone who didn't fight (not a *bot* we get to fight in the beginning) as well as take a minute each to unlock a 15s chest...  Otherwise its nice!
I do enjoy this game, however there needs to have a few more features, a story mode would do great, as i can see so much potential with the sensos having their own story

descriptionHTML:
Ready, set, SENSO! Assemble a mash-up squad of armored tanks, cats and dinosaurs, tentacled aliens, giant mechs, creepy zombies, and more in SUPER SENSO, a blazing fast turn-based action-strategy game set to usher in a new era of mobile competition. When armies collide, will you be able to outsmart and obliterate your opponents?

== WORD ON THE STREET ==

“The Hearthstone of Turn-Based Strategy games..." – Polygon
"Embracing core gaming..." – CNBC
"Turn based mech battling with cats..." – TouchArcade
“Super Senso Brings High Speed Advance Wars Strategy Combat to Mobile Device.” – Siliconera

== FEATURES ==

● Battle players from around the world in real-time PvP multiplayer matches
● Climb the global Lightning Challenge Leaderboard to win epic prizes
● Collect and level-up SENSO heroes that fit your play style! Whether it’s soaring over opponents with Chuck or dominating on defense with Guardian, the choice is yours!

comments: Good game but.... 1:there isn't anything like missions or free roam or training and all. 2:there is only 1 view of the player at least there could be multiple views. 3:controls cannot be changed 4:there is nothing to unlock. Addition of more weapons, characters and stages could make the game more interesting 5:there could be stages with various times of the day and various weather conditions....and last of all, Harley's voice sounds like a man's.if u correct this i will rate 5 stars. Thanks

The only way I'm adding an extra star is if the other characters are added, I'd like to play as all of them. Plus, cool new unlocks and game modes would be amazing. Another idea for the extreme mode is to have a flag running around and if he 'dies' you auto lose the game. Great game though

Good game. Some bumps on the way but all in all it was amazing and the powers that the players have is phenomenal. I can get to super high levels just playing Harley Quinn. I used this trick one time where I turned my device off every time i died and I would come back on that same level. I went all the way to level 30 something but then I accidentally deleted it. Whoops!! Anywho it was a great game I recommend this to everyone but if you don't like DC or fighting games and stuff like this then it is not a game for you.

This game is alright but it can be amazing. It needs more choice. For example the characters  and the places you can go to. They limited the charatcer from 11 to 3. There are so much more characters in the film. They even show them on the front but don't have them in the game. It would also be interesting to see how each character work with their ability and characteristic. Another thing is that they did not add different places. All they added was the room around the train station and inside it. They need more than that to surprise me. Thankfully  the graphics was amazing. So now i hope they fix these problems to get a 5 star.

Maybe add more characters other than Harley, Deadshot and El Diablo I think every one would like to have a 3rd person view maybe the option of playing the other characters like Joker, Captain Bomerang or Killer Croc. Also it would be awesome to have other areas. Such as having floors of the office and other places around the movie. Thank you.

This game is so cool it's so easy and awesome but can you add more of the squad? and a store and maximum health like 1,000000? And take out high score and leader board? And add multiplayer? And in multiplayer we get to play as the squad and the creatures. And level up? And also add a attack button? And add more special attack buttons? And also when one of the squad dies we can revive them? Thx. I'm still enjoying this game Though.
description: Join the Squad!  In this official Suicide Squad film game, you have been selected to lead a special task force comprised of highly dangerous incarcerated Super Villains. It is up to you and your Squad of antiheroes to defeat the horde of enemies that try to stop you. Fight as Harley Quinn with her signature baseball bat, or as Deadshot with his rifle or as Diablo with fire.  Can you complete the mission?  Are you Squad enough?  Features: First person shooter action optimized for mobile play. Survive as long as you can against increasingly challenging enemies.Master Harley‚Äôs, Deadshot‚Äôs and Diablo‚Äôs weapons and special abilities. Explore the city to locate health packs, ammo and upgrades in order to survive against your enemies. Compete against other players in a daily, weekly and all-time leader board. Record HD footage while playing and share it on social media.Note:- This app needs access to your device storage in order to load additional content. This is required for the game to run.

comments: I love the game. It feels like i am playing old ragnarok online. But some skills won't function. I have an assassin hero and most skills that i've learned out of those skill books won't work at all. I don't know if those spells are intended for the an assassin job class for for mages  I am having problems with the abyss ruina cave. I am already lvl 196 and i cant finish the quest even i killed already the shadow maker

Good graphics!I like how the character moves thats the first thing i noticed and the effects of attacks is awesome too! But i think to change style is too hard because dungeons are hardcore and its challenging but its too hard like 23stars for the second style and this is the only problem for me. Good game tho. I HOPE ODDY ARTS WILL MAKE ANPTHER GAME LIKE THIS WITH BALANCED GAMEPLAY AND ANOTHER GREAT STORYLINE AND MORE STUFF TO DO. I REALLY LIKED THIS GAME AND I HOPE YOU WILL MAKE MORE

Lost Data After phone restarted. Once downloaded, this game quickly became the only game I played on my phone. The dungeons are challenging. Building your character and finding rare items is insanely addictive. Easily my favorite overall game in the Google Store. But... every game I have keeps it's saved and sadly this did not. I can't give a high grade to a RPG that won't actually save the time you put into it.

This game is awesome! But... This RPG is amazing, can't stop playing and this is the type of game I'm looking for. But something isn't right though. I just leveled up to  20 noticing my skill points are still the same. Is there something I have to do to earn it? Or its suppose to be added once you leveled up. I'll give 5 stars for the improvement. I just can't let go of this game!üòÉ

The Best! I've been looking for this type of RPG on the android system for a long time! It has a very good collision detection system for its kind.It has a user-friendly interface. Good story. Superb-difficulty for those who love grinding levels like diablo. More importantly, the style system is very addicting! You'll want to level up your characters to see how devastating they can become. Thank you very much for this game!

Overall, this game is good. I could play online or offline. But there's something that quite bugging me. The control is way too sensitive so i couldn't control it normally. And it would be great if there's feature like "crafting" by fusing 3 equipment/item that doesn't needed to get better equipment/item, and the last one is "buyback" feature. I think that is all from me, thank you very much and stay aweome.

comments: This is a great game. Things balance out in terms of time and crafting. You can also earn diamonds fairly easily so you don't need to buy anything. The only issues I have is the market place, everything is gone as soon as you open it, even if you opened it exactly when it refreshes.

It an amazing game just wish it would quite lagging and miss connecting. Would be nice is you could sell some of those free gifts you get or the stuff you buy and don't need like the decorations. All they do is stock up and never get used. Be nice to sell them so you can get more money.

Good game to pass time  . Just too expensive to buy new items and also annoyed by the buy but have to build items. Also i just added friends thru d game n would be glad if theres also a lil' chat box or acknowledging box (wanna thank those game friends since i dnt know them personally üòä) . Looking forward to this game being playable offline (my wish) .

Adorable graphics! Great concept. Missed the bar with execution. Feels like they rush you too much right away with what you have to do and the time needed to do it. Not nearly enough slots open to complete orders properly and smoothly.... I have played too many similar games to know that it shouldn't be this frustrating.  Just some minor tweaks needed. I think if I just ignore my customers completely for a couple levels and give myself some good headway it will be more enjoyable but I'm afraid the problem will still persist... With how really cute the graphics are (complete with adorable cows and deeply chickens)I'm very sad that I may just have to look for a better one.

Very beautiful designed game... But I feel for cooking time should be less... Have to wait a lot... About 20 minutes some..times to prepare dishes ..cannot purchase coins as well...üòÄoverall a wonderful... Super duper addictive unique GAME.. bless the person who made it!

comments: Great! You should definitely download this! I really love this game. The game is very simple yet fun. I have only been playing twist for a little but I'm already hooked. The only reason I rated this 4 stars Is because of the ads. There Is an ad about every four times you fail. These ads are very common in most Ketchapp games and they aren't that much of a bother.

Good time killer Once you get the hang of it, it's simple in theory, but still challenging. It's a really basic game with only limited things you can change, so once you've bought everything, you kind of just build up points, but it's good as a time killer. Ads are only once every few failures. Not the end of the world. And not laggy or too bright on my screen.

Fun And Perhaps Too Simple This is a very simple game. As in, one or two sound effects, no music at all, seven varying colors of blocks, and a blank background except for a spiral of never ending blocks. All of the fun is from the focus you give in one simple tap from not dying. I feel like there is some sort of depth perception problem, but that might just be me. The achievements and the different skins are minimalistic to say the least. However, for an arcade game, I give it a pass if you are into fast reaction types of games.

Pretty Decent Time Killer A pretty decent app with a few minor downsides. These mainly consist of adds that pop up when you're not expecting them, meaning you can accidentally click on them quite a bit. Other than that seems well optimised and it's very easy to loose hours to this game.

Nice Game but I have a few suggestions. I have bought all of the balls and floor colors and i'd like some more to buy especially because it's easy to get. Also if the little pink balls point/money thing could also have some design options than that would be great. I've read some reviews that says this game has too many ads but I personally haven't had any problem with ads. The amount of ads in this game is also found in other games so it's really nothing to complain about.

Still recommend something else With LOOOTTTSSS of patience and time,  you could get good. Problem is,  the levels would be that same over and over. I recommend something like geometry dash. It has lots of levels, full version has level  maker, also you can play other levels made by people, it's colorful and VERY ADDICTING, and last, it's more popular to ensure that there is always a level you can play, with people making them in level editor.
